1.content: Please select the story or "scenario" you want to read/add too.
1.title: The beginning. Choose your story.

11.content:
A plane carrying several mysterious magical artefacts has exploded directly over Springfield. One of the rings has come to be in the possession of Mr Burns and word soon leaked out of the rings and their powers. They each allow the person wearing them to wield supernatural powers and if anyone could collect them all and perform a ritual they would create a ring of unique power: A ring of unlimited wishes.

 
There is talk throughout the town of the artefacts and where they might be. Many people are trying to find them including Mr Burns, Sideshow Bob, Lenny and Carl ect. Even the Simpson's themselves are after the rings as Lisa's research has suggested that there may be something in the supernatural powers that are attributed to them. They each grant the user the power to transform themselves or others in some way for example the ring of age allows one to AR/AP a subject while the ring of Inflation allows people to inflate/deflate themselves and others.

 
Many people in Springfield are seeking the power these trinkets might bring the only question is which pair of them will the story focus on?
11.title: The search is on.

111.content:
Marge sat at the Simpsonâ€™s kitchen table lost in thought at what her husband had told her when he came home from work that afternoon. So it was true. These magic items existed and Mr Burns had one of them. The rest she supposed given what happened to the aircraft carrying them must be somewhere in or near Springfield. Marge thought grimly that if something wasn't done then that nasty angry greedy old man would probably get his hands on *all* of the rings. Then god only knows what he'd do with them. For one thing probably de-age himself a bit so he wasn't so old and frail. Great thought Marge: Just what this town needs a new younger fitter but still crooked and spiteful Mr Burns.

 
"Marge! MARGE!"

 
Marge shook here head and looked at her husband who was sitting across the table from her shouting to try to get her attention. She frowned a little. "Homer, do you mind I was trying to weigh up the situation and decide if we should do something. This is serious especially if that evil old man gets his hands on this magic power." Marge stated.

 
"Well what do we do? Mr Burns already has all the money in town. If he gets all these rings he'll be a million times worse Marge!" Homer replied.

 
Marge sighed. "Well I suppose we'll have to do something." She smiled at Homer somewhat. "Don't worry, together we can find the rest of the rings and stop that old tyrant getting his hands on them. Maybe we can even get the ring he has if we play our cards right. Your with me right?" Marge asked.

 
Homer nodded his head. "Of course Marge. But do you think you can find the rings?" Homer said.

 
Marge shook her head then spoke. "Not specifically but I'm a witch so I can sense powerful magic items like Santa's Little Helper smells pork sausages." Marge answered.

 
Homer looked confused for a second or two. "Soo..you smell them by sniffing the ground a lot?" Homer asked.

 
Marge half closed her eyes and growled. "Lets just go Homer, get the car ready. Where ever these rings are I bet they aren't in our backyard." Marge replied and her dim-witted husband said a quite "sorry" as he grabbed his keys and headed to the driveway to start the car up.

 
Homer started the car and Marge got in after locking the front door of the house. The car pulls away and heads off down Evergreen terrace. Marge and Homer decide to look for the artefacts in...
111.title: Homer and Marge.

choices: The energy source in the gorge.
The energy source in the woods by the gorge.
The strange energy in the area they are in at the moment.
1111.content:
Unlike many of the other people searching for the rings it occurred to Marge that some of the rings may have landed NEAR Springfield but not IN Springfield. So she instructed Homer to drive out to Springfield gorge too see if any rings had fallen there. Marge had a "feeling" that at least one of the powerful magic items was either in the gorge itself or in the woods nearby but this was more than a mere hunch. After all Marge was an accomplished witch and therefore had a knack for finding powerful magic artefacts.

After an uneventful drive the Simpson's pink sedan pulled up at the picnic area near the side of the gorge. Marge and Homer got out of the car which Homer soon locks then looks at Marge who is looking around as if trying to gauge the direction to the location of the ring/s.

Marge grumbles looking concerned. "Mmmrr..Homer I'm getting mixed signals. I feel something down in the gorge itself but there is something in the woods on the other side. There's all so something else I'm feeling too. I don't know what it is but is sure as sugar isn't any magic item. I wonder if someone else is here looking for the rings too." She says before looking back at Homer who just shrugs and says. "Well shouldn't we grab whatever we can and then get out of here? I mean it's kinda dangerous to be walking around alone in the woods like this. Besides there are other rings in Springfield and we've got to stop my boss getting them."

Marge nods and then decides to head for.
1111.title: The odd couple are on their way.

choices: Rinusha Masked overlord! He tries to steal Marge's powers and TF them!
Someone else other than Mr ThiefyMcStealsmagicalot.
11113.content:
Marge was worried about that odd feeling she was getting from the area around where they parked the car. She knew something magic was out there, maybe a wizard, warlock or another witch. Maybe some kind of magical creature from another world. One thing was for sure it was extremely unlikely to be friendly and Marge didn't like the idea of looking over her shoulder the whole time they where here.

"Ok Homer, follow me and try not to make a noise." Marge using her magic to call down a cloak of invisibility on herself and Homer she began to search the immediate area trying to find out what if anything was here and if something was what kind of threat it would pose.

They spent maybe half an hour walking back and fourth through the woods playing a game of cat and mouse with..what? Something was out there. Marge was surer of that than ever. Eventually they confronted whatever it was in a clearing. Marge used her magic to give herself absolute sight of the area and discovered the other being was...
11113.title: Something’s up. Danger approaches.

111131.content:
Marge knew some things about the cloaked being across her. She suddenly went through a flashback of when she was Lisa's age and her mother, who was one of the most powerful witches in the world, would tell her the story of the Dekokaun tribe. The tribe was destructive, wore cloaks and masks, and was known only by magical beings not just because it was secret, but also because they were where the darks arts started. A long time ago, the Denokuans forged the ring of Unlimited Wishes which was the mother of all magic in the universe. One time, a legendary pope, Pope John the First, took the tribe's ways as respect of the devil and assaulted their base in Asia. During the battle, one of the tribes members hid the Ring where it was never seen again. But the reason why there were so many little rings was a mystery. Sadly, she never even told Lisa about the tale.

Marge immediately shook out of her flashback when the cloaked figure saw her and teleported in front of her. "Sorry if I scared you miss, I am Rinusha," the being said. "What do you want from me?" Marge asked curiously. "I want what is mine!" Rinusha roared when he tried to grapple Marge only with failure. "Homer! Run!" Marge commanded him when he didn't do so and just watched. Marge and Rinusha then both released bolts of lightning from their fingertips. Both energy beams collided for a while until one pasted through the other and electrocuted the loser. Who was the victor?
111131.title: Rinusha's Second Assault

1111311.content: Unfortunately for Marge, Rinusha's lightning blast grew too strong and zapped her. At first the electrical attack was painful. But then she began to feel weaker as the lightning turned into a green chain of light that moved energy from her into Rinusha. "Just like your daughter," Rinusha said without emotion as she became...
1111311.title: Rinusha's Second Victory

choices: find the other rings. Maybe she can find Rinusha.
11113111.content:
Marge felt the magical green chain pull away her age in pain. Her body shrunk along with any womanly features she had. "Marge!" Homer yelled, running after her. But Rinusha used a psychic blast to push him back. If Rinusha had a face, he would be smiling because the spell was complete. Instead of a middle-aged woman, Marge was now an eight-year old. Luckily for her, she still had her magic powers.

The green chain that took away Marge's age began to curl itself into a energy sphere. The sphere had a glass surface with green energy running around inside. The glass surface had a inscription with said "Marge Simpson". She didn't need to ask what it was for it was obvious that the sphere contained her age energy. Before she could do anything, Rinusha spoke, "Have a nice second childhood." And with that, he threw a magical smoke ball at the ground and he was nowhere to be seen by the time the smoke cleared.

Marge thought about her new situation. But one thing bothered her even more, "Why didn't he steal my magic?" Homer was still knocked out from the psychic blast. Marge took the time to think of what to do. After some thought, she decided to...
11113111.title: Marge the Juvenile Witch

111131111.content: Marge gave it some thought and decided that there was no point chasing Rinusha since there were so many rings probably still out there and up for grabs. Who knows maybe she could find the age ring and restore her lost age energy. If not then maybe she could prevent some rings falling into the hands of Rinusha or some other person who might abuse their power. Homer eventually woke up and once Marge explained what happened the couple decided to go look for more rings in...
111131111.title: Marge decides to go ring hunting.

11113112.content:
As Marge felt pain and her age leaking away, her body shrunk and her green witch skin turned more human. She tried to get up, but her legs collapsed and made her fall. Strangely, when she hit the soil ground, she felt like she wanted to cry. Homer could only stand still, horrified, when Marge's transformation was complete. She felt scared and humiliated now that she was a normal baby instead of an adult witch. When Marge's powers got absorbed into Rinusha's body, he began to laugh manically.

"As I said before, you are now as weak and pitiful as your daughter, Lisa," he said coldly. Marge began to think with her now-infant mind, "What is he talking about? Did he make Lisa a powerless baby too?" Did Rinusha mess with Marge and Homer some more or did he leave them alone?
11113112.title: Another witch reduced to almost nothing

choices: Make Marge a twin baby to Lisa called Lissa.
Transform Homer into a big blobby ball like the Homerball from the Simpsons game
111131121.content:
Rinusha sensed that Marge was worried about her daughter Lisa even in her current babiefied state. He smiled a cruel smile as he spoke in a mocking tone to Marge. "Awww isn't that cute, even as a baby you're worried about your little girl. Well if you like Lisa so much then maybe you should become her twin!" He then laughed maniacally again as Marge shuddered and Homer cowered. "Or perhaps.." He continued. "..you'd prefer it if I messed with the fat man here. Hmm..the possibilites. I have a new ring whose powers might suit you just right fatty!"

Rinusha then began to hover above the terrified pair as he mentally debated what to do and in the end he decided to use his powers too...
111131121.title: He's not done with Marge/Homer yet.

choices: He tells Marge about his attack on Lisa then Marge goes to help her, he escapes.
1111312.content:
Both Marge and Rinusha targeted each other with their magical lightning attacks until eventually Marge's magic broke through and electrocuted the masked stranger. He fell back onto the ground stunned for a moment before getting up on one knee. Homer just watched the entire thing while saying "Coooool" to himself.

Marge was about to use her magic again to finish Rinusha off when he did something unexpected which was.
1111312.title: Marge wins the magic duel.

choices: Drained Lisa of her magic energy. Marge restores it with her magic.
Drained Lisa of her magic energy and TFed her in some way. Marge fixes it.
11113121.content:
Struggling to his feet Rinusha grinned maliciously and said "Well it seems you are more powerful than I had thought, I wish I could say the same for your little girl, I was sure after draining her energy I could defeat you but. Oh well. Perhaps another time." then he threw a smoke bomb at the ground and disappeared.

"Is he really gone?" Homer asked. Marge nodded "Yes. I'd be able to tell if he was still around. Homer come on, it sounds as if Lisa is in trouble. Just let me use my magic to find her. Oh no! Homer! We have to go now! He took her powers, she needs our help." With that Homer and Marge headed back to the car then back to Springfield.

When they arrive in down town Springfield they discover Rinusha had.
11113121.title: Help is on the way.

111132.content: It wasn't the masked overlord so in fact who was it that Marge had discovered?
111132.title: So it's not Rinusha then who is it?

choices: Yes. Marge has found her son and that Lovejoy girl.
1111322.content: How about Bart and Jessica?
1111322.title: Someone else.

choices: Yup. He's come after Marge and Homer.
11113222.content: Maybe it's Xeer the age Vampire?
11113222.title: Nope. It's not them.

choices: Davron the mystic mage master of magic deflection.
111132222.content: It was in fact some completely different villain who was stalking Homer and Marge. It turned out to be...
111132222.title: None of the above so...

choices: She decides to help Homer and Marge.
She declines to join them and gets in a magical dual with Marge.
1111322222.content:
Marge realised that she was facing another sorceress although she didn't seem familiar so she asked the mysterious being to identify themselves. "Excuse me. But who or what are you to be walking around in the woods here at night?" Marge asked the obviously female silhouette that was leaning on a tree a few meters in front of them. There was a chuckle and then she got a response of a sort. "Well I could ask you the very same question. I'm Kyleen, a sorceress by trade, don't bother straining your memory, I'm sure I haven't made your blue haired acquaintance. I'd have remembered something like that." Marge was taken aback for a moment then the figure stepped closer towards herself and Homer. Marge could see an exotic looking woman with tanned skin, dark hair wearing what could only be described as a set of robes and wearing on her right hands middle finger what Marge supposed was probably a magic TF ring. Certainly she was feeling a magical signature from it and not just from the person who was wearing it, although Marge was certain that she wasn't bluffing either. This person *was* a sorceress of some kind.

Marge decided speak, perhaps she could talk some sense into this woman but then it was just as likely that they would end up fighting a magic dual if she was determined to seek out the rings for herself. "Well I'm Marge Simpson, a concerned local.." Marge hesitated and Kyleen interrupted. "Witch. Sorceress. Wise woman. Gypsy. Whatever name you care to use. Yes Marge I know you’re a magic user. Your not the only one who can sense the presence of magical beings and items you know. So what is it you wish of me? Or perhaps I should ask what are you intentions towards the artefacts that are present in and around your town?" Marge replied somewhat gravely. "I intend to take possession of them in order to keep them out of the hands of the wicked, criminal or otherwise irresponsible individuals who would abuse them." Kyleen pauses as if considering this for a moment. "So you don't seek them for powers sake but to stop them being used to harm other people. Very noble. If you believe in that sort of thing." she muses. Marge meanwhile speaks again. "Well perhaps we could work together to find the rings and put an end to this dangerous situation. After all neither of us would benefit from these artefacts falling into the hands of crooks or delinquents." Marge proposed.

Kyleen looks at Marge and Homer for a moment. "Well it would be safer to have someone to watch my back and you make a persuasive if rather straight laced argument. As you probably guessed I already found one of the transformation rings" She holds up the ring on her right hand middle finger. "But the question is should I join you? Well normally I work alone but it might be nice to work with another witch and her..partner for a change." she says and steps back away from Homer and Marge slightly. "Well you'd better make your mind up because I intend to secure those rings either with your help or without it. Oh and yes Homer and I are married." Marge stated somewhat bluntly.

Kyleen thinks about co-operating with the Simpson's and then decides...
1111322222.title: Slightly offbeat magic user.

choices: Around the woods in Evergreen terrace.
112.content:
Bart was sitting on his bed pondering if the report he'd intercepted on his police radio scanner that his mom gave him when she was a cop was genuine. I mean it sounded too cool to be true. Bart had learned from experience that such things tended to be hoaxes or peoples delusions.

 
Still. What if it was true. A plane exploded. Right here. But the part about magic artefacts must be bull surely. Bart didn't think much more about it until he overheard Homer talking to his mom about it then Bart got an idea. If this really was true and if Mr Burns did really have one of these things then maybe just maybe...

 
Well Bart reasoned he was a fairly accomplished thief and occasional vandal. Not that his exploits where anything to brag about in prison but still. Maybe he could find the rings first. It had to be worth a try surely. He'd need help though. His mom and his square of a sister would probably want to destroy the rings or use them for the good of mankind or some other bullcrap. Bart of course had other ideas. Mainly around personal gain and power. Perhaps even revenge on his teachers who'd made him stand there and write lines on the blackboard in detention.

 
Bart snapped back to reality. Right help..help..maybe Jessica? She was bad to the bone, worse than him in many ways and he knew he couldn't trust her. But he all so knew she would work with him to get the rings because she probably wanted them too. Bart then supposed he could double cross her or maybe something else. He'd cross that bridge when he got to it.

 
Bart slipped out of the Simpson's house and expertly made his way to the Lovejoy's house without being seen. However he didn't get all the way there as he saw Jessica walking along the pavement towards Evergreen Terrace. Without thinking Bart jumped out from his hiding place and said hello startling Jessica who he noticed was wearing a very cute expensive looking dress that he'd never seen her wear before.

 
"Bart?! Ah! I was looking for you. We need to talk. I need your help with something." Jessica said smiling at Bart and batting her eyelashes at him which caused Bart to raise an eyebrow.

 
Bart sighed. "Ah Jessica, I have only one thing to say to you." Bart said.

 
"Um..and that would be?" Jessica asked.

 
"Knock it off. I already know about the rings and I guess you probably have one of them there." Bart said taking Jessica's hand and pointing to a strange looking ring on her right middle finger.

 
Jessica smiled and shifted her feet. "Well actually Bart your right, I swiped it right from under old man Burns nose while he was having his longevity treatment. Now I need someone to help me find the rest of them so I can finally get the power, wealth, respect.."

 
Bart frowned. "Yes Jesse, we all know about your sense of entitlement and how your bad to the bone but really what dose that ring do?" He asked.

 
Jessica laughed. "Well I'll give you three guesses Bart." She said and pointed at him.

 
Bart then looked down at himself and realised he was wearing an exact copy of his sister Lisa's sunday best outfit including the pink shoes, dress and hat. Jessica was laughing so hard she nearly fell over. Bart blushed bright red and pouted crossing his arms.

 
"Turn me back Jessica. Now!" He said feeling ridiculous wearing such a girly outfit.

 
Jessica stopped laughing and Bart's cloths reverted to his normal red t-shirt and blue shorts outfit with no hat. Bart glared at Jessica. "What? I just wanted you to get in touch with your feminine side Bart!" She said sticking her tongue out at him.

 
"Ha ha. Let's go. It's gonna be a long night co's we'll have to search on foot. Heh how are we gonna find the rings anyway?" Bart said slightly worried.

 
Jessica smiled at Bart. "Well Bart let's say there are some things about me you don't know. Although you where right about what you said earlier." She said as they both set off to look for the rings.

 
The pair decided to search first in a particular part of Springfield which was...
112.title: Bart and Jessica.

Jessica turns into a punch doll.(Ring of Inanimate TF.)
Jessica begins to shrink.(Ring of Size TF.)

Bart and Jessica headed off downtown to begin their search for the rings. They decided to concentrate on the alleyways behind Main Street as it seemed a likely place the rings could have ended up and not been noticed. After all if they just fell into the crowded main street then the chances are someone would have noticed them and picked them up. Bart and Jessica searched for over half an hour through old boxes, trashcans and assorted rubbish but didn't find anything yet.

Jessica crossed her arms and sighed. "Bart, I don't think it's here. We've been up and down these ally's and we haven't found anything like the ri..heh..what have you got there Bart?" She says noticing Bart had found a small metallic object behind a trash can.

Bart replies. "I don't know Jessica but I bet I can find out." He then puts on the ring and concentrates on Jessica who looks a little nervous wondering if the ring Bart has is a TF ring and if so which one it is.

"Bart don't test it on me. Come on be cool." Jessica protests but within seconds...

He puts the ring away then picks up Jessica and treats her like a baby.

Despite Jessica's protests Bart was determined to have some fun with the ring and as he focused on his partner the ring began to emit an errie glow and Jessica started to shrink.

Smaller, smaller and smaller she gets until she is about the same size as Bart's baby sister Maggie. Otherwise her appearance is unchanged with her age, cloths and body proportions remaining unaffected by her abrupt shrinking.

Bart holds on to himself and laughs then something happens...

What does Jessica do next?

get Bart to let her go

As Bart was spanking Jessica and treating her like a baby he stopped for a while to laugh. Jessica decided that instead of crying she would use this opportunity to make a grab for the shrinking ring Bart had put in his pocket only moments before.

Jessica grabbed it and concentrated at she tried to use the ring to...

Bart couldn't feel or see a thing for awhile until the light faded away into the night. Bart looked at himself and saw that there was something wrong. Bart transformed by...

1123111.content: Bart looked at himself and noticed that his hair was longer than usual and lost its spikes. "My hair!" Bart cried as he heard his now higher voice and covered his mouth embarrassed. Slowly, he removed his hands from his mouth before he spoke again. "No! It can't be!" Bart said becoming really scared. He ran to the nearest puddle of water and saw in his reflection that he now looked like Lisa besides his clothes and long hair. "I-I'm a girl?" Bart asked to him, now, herself in shock. Just then...
1123111.title: Gender Transformation

choices: Listen to Bart. Don't change his outfit.
Ignore him. Change his cloths to something really girly.
11231111.content:
As Bart was staring at his now very female reflection he didn't notice Jessica walking up quietly behind him.

"Hey! Who are you? And have you seen a boy wearing an outfit kinda like..oh my god. Bart is that you?" Jessica says realising that the girl she is looking at is dressed like and physically resembles Bart.

Bart turns around to face Jessica and speaks. "Y..yes it's me Jessica. I found this ring on a tree then I put it on my finger and this (Bart gestures to himself) happened!"

Jessica smiles. "Well Bart you look very cute but you know you really need a new wardrobe. That shirt and shorts combo doesn't suit you any more." Jessica says before taking the ring of clothing TF out of her pocket.

Bart sees this and remembers what Jessica did to him as a joke earlier. "No! Jessica that isn't funny! Don't change my clothes!" He pleaded.

In the end Jessica decided too...

The clothing she wore finally stopped transforming when it reached her feet and turned pink to make a dress. "Colud things be any worse?" said Bart humiliated as his shoes turned into pink high-heels and a pink bow appeared and wrapped around her hair. "You look so cute in that dress!" Jessica smiled in glee as she took the Ring of Gender TF away from Bart. "I'll take that! Now let's find the other rings, Bart-ina," Jessica said with a pause when she grabbed Bartina who was having trouble with her high-heels.

"Jessica! NO! TURN ME BACK! I don't want to be like this!" Bartina said as she grappled with her ringfinding partner and tried not to fall over in her unfamiliar high heels.

Jessica eventually backs away and takes the ring of clothing TF out of her pocket again and looks threateningly at Bartina. "Look Bart-ina. If you don't behave and help me find the rest of the rings I'll use these rings (She takes the other ring the ring of Gender TF out of her poke at this point) to make you and your outfit even more girly and femanine. So you'd better start behaving yourself right now!"

However this doesn't go down well with the former ten year old boy Bartina who yells at Jessica and stamps his..uh her feet in defiance and crosses her arms over her chest.

Jessica sighs. "Well then it looks like you gave me no choice. Prepare to turn into a pretty cutesy girly girl Bart-INA!" Jessica says before concentrating on the rings which begin to glow at the same time.

Bartina thinks about running but it's far to late as after only a few seconds the rings activate and...

It works and Bartina turns even more girly and feminine, her clothes become pink and sissified with her dress poufing out and her feature becoming softer and more female. Bartina lays there dazed for a moment and then realises what's happened "NOOOOOOOOOOOOOO" she screams and then tries to grab Jessica who simple pushes her over. Jessica then sits on her face and laughs as she farts over and over and taunts her "your a little sissy girl", "I cant believe your loosing to a girl" she then gets up and lets Bartina kiss her feet before getting up and forces her to courtesy in front of her as a sign of submission. There is no doubt about it Jessica totally dominates Bartina now.

But what happens now? Will Jessica and Bartina proceed to find more rings or will Jessica bully Bartina some more and make fun of her?
11231111211.title: It works Bartina becomes a little princess!

choices: Make Bart a boy again.(Gender TF.)
Make Bart less girly but still a girl.(Clothing TF.)
112311112112.content:
Jessica go tired of messing with the now very feminine Bartina and decided that they had better go find the rest of those transformation rings. After all this was why they teamed up in the first place. Jessica motioned Bartina to follow her and began to walk towards the edge of the woods around Evergreen Terrace. After some short distance Bartina began to ask Jessica if she could change her back to being a boy or at least reverse the clothing TF that Jessica did to her. After a while Jessica began to get annoyed at Bartina's nagging and turned around to face her.

Bartina flinched thinking Jessica was about to yell at her or grab her then her angry face changed and she looked conflicted. Jessica wasn't sure if she wanted to turn Bart back or if she should just make him stay as a girly girl. On the one hand this was pretty funny and she didn't really care about Bart that much. Their partnership was more an alliance of convenience than anything. But then again he (she) wasn't much use to Jessica if she was a little sissy girl that would probably cry or run away if something bad happened. 113.content:
Lisa heard her parents car pull out of the driveway and knew her brother was nowhere to be seen. It seemed her instincts and indeed her magic was right. Something was going on. Could it really be true? Where the tales going around Springfield actually real? It didn't seem likely she thought as she descended the stairs of the Simpson's house. Then again she knew something was up and she shuddered at the idea that Mr Burns might get his hands on all of the magic artefacts and then abuse their power. Lisa hadn't forgotten the last time she'd tried to help him after he ended up bankrupt and the power plant was sold to Germans. The thing about Mr Burns was that he was selfish and evil and when he tried to be good he was even *more* evil.

 
Something needed doing and Lisa didn't much like the idea of what might happen if her dad or her annoying brother got their hands on the rings either. Lisa was a witch so she knew that the hardest thing about having great power is not to use it. Any mortal just acquiring such items of power was she reasoned bound to lead to suffering and harm for all except maybe the person with the power. Even that couldn't be ruled out really. But what if she got hold of one or more of the rings? Could she trust even herself? Well she reasoned the odds where better than just letter Bart or Mr Burns or dad get them. It was
time for action.

 
Lisa put on her coat and headed outside where she locked the door using her powers. Simple spells to lock/unlock doors where after all merely cantrips to someone as skilled in magic as her. Besides the lock was hardly a complex one it was just an average civilian front door. Lisa then turned invisible and headed towards where she knew Milhouse lived. After a short walk Lisa arrived at Milhouse's house and hoping he wasn't with his dad she let herself in and snuck into Milhouse's room.

 
Milhouse for his part was sitting on his bed reading a comic book and chuckling to himself occasionally. There was a can of soda on his bedside table. Obviously he wasn't busy. Lisa suddenly appeared in front of Milhouse or at least it looked like she did in fact she had entered the room while invisible and then allowed herself to be seen because she wanted to be.

 
Milhouse lowered the comic and stared for a moment. "Lisa? What are you doing here?" He said not a bit phased at her sudden appearance in front of him.

 
Lisa suddenly looked worried. "Milhouse? Didn't you wonder how I just appeared like that?" Lisa asked.

 
Milhouse smiled. "Well I am friends with your brother and you know what they say bro's before hoe's." He replied.

 
Lisa looked irritated screwing up her face somewhat. "Damn Bart, I mean I know it's impossible to keep such a secret within a family but you aren't family Milhouse. I can't believe he told you." Lisa said looking rather irate.

 
Milhouse shrugged. "Well it's ok. I didn't tell anyone or mention it and I won't. I don't want anything to happen to you or your mom. Anyway what did you come all this way for? Did Bart tell you he told me you where a witch?" Milhouse enquired.

 
Lisa sighed. "No Milhouse. That's not why I'm here. I need some help for a..task I need to undertake. I guess I'd better explain what happened." Lisa said then told Milhouse all about the exploding plane and the magic rings and how Mr Burns and Bart, Homer and probably half of Springfield is out to get them. She all so told him what could happen if any one person gets them all.

 
Milhouse sat quietly before looking up at Lisa who was standing on the bed having been explaining what was going on. "Well." he said. "We'd better get started I suppose. This is too weird." The pair sneak out with Lisa using her powers to make sure no one see either or them then they head out into Springfield to find the magic artefacts.

 
As the invisible pair stop to catch their breath on a street corner Milhouse asks where they should start searching.

 
Lisa thinks for a moment then says..how about...

"Hmm..so it is true." Said Mr Burns examining a strange looking ring with an eyeglass. "A magic artefact from the days of yore. Many would doubt that such a things exists Smithers. Frankly I'm having trouble believing it exists even having it in my hand." Burns puts the ring into pocket and looked at his assistant.

 
Smithers coughs uneasily. "Well sir, I have to admit it seems a remarkable find but aren't there supposed to be several other rings that have similar properties?" He said to his boss.

 
Mr Burns nods and comes out from behind his desk to address Smithers. "Yes indeed there are. Smithers I want those rings, at any cost. I intend to search for them personally. With your able assistance of course." He says to Smithers who gasps.

 
Smithers is shocked. "But sir, you where always so concerned for personal safety. Wouldn't it be better to allows some of your..agents to handle this or at least let me do it myself? You could get hurt after all and I don't know what I would do if that happened." He says to his boss and mentor.

 
Burns shakes his head. "No Smithers this is something that I must do myself. After all given the nature of these artefacts would you trust a hired hand or a hired goon? Imagine if they discovered the true power of the rings. They'd never give them to me or they'd make me pay ten times what their fee was. I'd be the laughing stock of the underworld." Burns sighs. "Besides Smithers I'm a very old man, death holds little fear for me now. Frankly the only reason I'm still here is probably my weekly longevity treatment. Where I a poor man I'd have died long ago. Think of it Smithers as one last role of the dice. Either I win and gain immortality or I loose and die trying. But I won't sit by and let just any Johnny come lately take control of this power. This is a greater opportunity than you, I or anyone else will ever know." With that Mr Burns had convinced Smithers to help him find the rings personally but the question remained of where to look for them...

 
In the end the greedy old autocrat decided to search near...

Onboard Kang and Kodo's UFO an unnamed alien crewmember is looking at a display with a strange symbol on it when the symbol disappears. The aliens looks shocked then presses some buttons and turns to Kang.

"Captain Kang, the human air vehicle transporting the artefacts has exploded near a place called Springfield in the united states." The alien said to his master.

Kang growls and bears his teeth. "Damn it! I plan to steal those rings for all this time and now the damned air vehicle crashes before it lands at it's destination. Well I suppose at least now the hu-mons won't get their hands on them again." Kang says mostly too himself.

Just then Kodos enters the bridge of the alien craft from a nearby lift and approaches Kang. "Kang, I'm afraid I've just analysed the sensor logs of that explosion and I have some disturbing news. According too transmissions we've intercepted the artefacts may in fact be indestructible by any normal means." She says.

Kang gasps. "You mean..the hu-mon's could still possess the items! We have to act! We cannot allow the primitive life forms to wield the power contained in those rings. Kodos prepare to land near Springfield, our cloaking field should conceal our landing and as for infiltration I have a plan. Ha ha ha ha ha..." He says to his one eyed green alien counterpart.

Kodos nods. "Very well Kang, but we must be careful we don't want this to turn into another promxa centari incident." She says before the view switches to some back woods near Springfield. A noise not unlike a rocket engine can be heard then suddenly a squirrel is crushed flat as Kang and Kodos spacecraft lands with it's invisibility cloak engaged. The two aliens step out as soon as the ramp has lowered.

Kodos looks at Kang impatiently. "So Kang, what was your plan for infiltrating amongst these humans anyway?" She says folding her tentacles.

"Well Kodos you see there should be a couple of earthlings not far from here who we can scan and use their appearance to disguise ourselves as hu-mons." Kang explained.

Kodos put her tentacle to her head jar and responded. "Well then should we brutally murder them then assume their identities?" She asks in that oh so delightfully charming totally disregarding the rights of self aware creatures Rigellen way.

Kang shakes his head. "No actually Kodos high command decided that was becoming clich..I mean drawing too much attention so this time we temporarily transform them in some way then assume their identities." "Ha ha! Foolish earthlings, now they are trapped in our lab on our ship and we can assume their forms to infiltrate their town and find the artefacts!" (The magic rings.) Said Kang and then pushed another button on his exotic looking ray gun and both of the green tentacled aliens gradually transformed until they where exact physical copies of Sherri and Terri.

"There, now Kodos lets go and find these rings before those earthlings find them and high command reassigns us to toilet scrubbing duty on a garbage scow!" Kang says urgently and they set off towards Springfield to begin their search.

Soon Kang and Kodos arrive in the downtown area of downtown area of Springfield and pass completely unnoticed thanks to them assuming the forms of Sherri and Terri. They duck into an ally and Kodos pulls out a handheld tracking device. "Well it looks like some of the rings are in this area but many of them are spread out over the entire town and the nearby wilderness. Where should we start looking?" she says.

Kang thinks about this for a moment before responding...
11511.title: Shrink until they are tiny. Kang captures them ...

choices: We start looking in the woods near Springfield gorge.
We start looking near the docks district in Springfield.
We start looking near the nuclear power plant.
1152.content:
Sideshow Bob the evil criminal master mind and his equally malfeasant mendacious brother Cecil had recently escaped form Springfield jail when police chief Wiggum left the cell doors to the local jail open after removing a prisoner from a cell. Needless to say a riot soon began and Bob and his brother used the ensuing chaos to escape. Bob then linked up with some criminal contacts he'd learned about while in prison, committed a few crimes to raise some cash along with his brother then they bought the weapon that would enable then next part of their machiavellian plan. They bought a shoulder held surface to air missile launcher. Now one might wonder exactly why to common criminals would need or want such a think. Cecil certainly did.

"Look Bob I *still* don't understand why of all things you spent most of our money on that stinger missile system we've got in the back of the truck. I mean I suppose you could wait until the Simpson's next to on vacation then blow up their plane but really? Why bother? We could kill that meddling Bart and his sister a hundred times before that!" Cecil ranted to Bob who was driving their second hand pick up along the road through Springfield forest towards Mt Springfield.

The arch villain gave his brother a derisory look then began to explain his wicked plan. "Look Cecil, we COULD do that yes. We COULD just head straight for the Simpson's and probably get shot/arrested/beaten by the dozens of cops who'll be waiting for us because that's exactly what they expect me..expect us to do but I've got a better plan. I saw some odd paperwork while we where escaping Springfield prison. Surfice to say I want to get my hands on something on a plane and I don't believe such a thing could be accomplished at the airport. To heavily guarded now. Thank you very much Mr Osama Bin Laden! Anyway where was I. Oh yes, the plane. I believe it may contain the ring of wishes or possibly the component rings. Either way if we get one or several or maybe all of them then the Simpson's are doomed and my..our revenge will come to pass. That's just for starters as well."

Cecil sat bolt upright in his seat, then regained his composure. "So that's what you've been doing isn't it Bob. All this time, all those crimes and trades it was all working towards getting us a shot at a plane. Uh. You do realise if you miss I'm going to FEED YOU that stinger missile system."

Bob laughs maniacally. "Oh I won't miss brother, think about it. The plane will be slowing down, turning ready to land. We'll be right where we need to be to take them down before they have time to react. They won't know what hit them." Cecil nods and Bob carries on driving until the pair arrive at the base of Mt Springfield. Once there they park the truck remove the weapons/supplies which are in backpacks and a case then begin climbing the mountain path to get into position for firing the missile.

Some hours later halfway up Mt Springfield...

Bob and Cecil are looking frantically at their watches and scanning the skyline for signs of an approaching aircraft. "Bob! There! That's a cargo plane! It's got to be them!" shouts Cecil as Bob hefts the missile system locks onto the cargo plane as it passes over them...

*beep beep beep beeeeeeeeeep*

"I've got a lock Cecil. I'm going for it!" Bob squeezes the trigger and a missile hurtles out of the ends of the launcher then heads straight for the cargo planes starboard wing/engine. There is a small explosion followed by billowing black smoke from the plane then another much larger explosion as the plane disintegrates more or less directly over Springfield dropping it's cargo of magic rings in the town and the surrounding area.

Bob lowers. the missile launcher and says coldly. "Well Cecil as the Navy say: I'm glad I'm not on that! ha!"

Cecil just rolls his eyes and speaks. "Look Bob we actually have to go and get these rings, they aren't just going to magically gravitate to us you know. Where do you suggest we start looking?"

Bob thinks for a second while packing away the stinger in it's case then replies...
1152.title: Now the reason for the plane exploding...

choices: Make himself or others grow.(In height.)
11521.content:
Bob thinks for a second while packing away the stinger in it's case then replies, "We'll start in the woods near Springfield Gorge. It's a fairly secluded spot with a large area for the rings to land, so we'll have several rings before the rest of this ignorant town even knows their power."

Bob and Cecil start to look in the woods looking at the debris from the explosion to find that there were a few more items in the plane than the rings themselves. There are other non-magical artifacts such as swords, daggers, and shields around in the forest, but the rings are hard to find.

"I must say brother," says Cecil, "I can't seem to find any rings around here. Are you sure you shot the right plane down?"

"Of course I'm sure!" says Bob infuriated, "The paperwork said today at 3 PM, and guess what, I fired the missile at precisely 3 PM. There must be at least some rings around here."

Suddenly Bob sees a sword embedded in a large stone. The hilt of the sword has a colorful circular pattern on it with blues and greens. Bob examines the hilt for a while and decides to try to remove the rings from the hilt. However, his intentions are not instantly seen by Cecil.

"What the hell are you trying to do King Arthur? We not looking for Excalibur, we looking for the rings!"

"Ho ho!" says Bob struggling with the hilt, "This sword's hilt has two of the rings I need!"

The rings abruptly fly off the hilt and flew through the air, and Bob and Cecil raise their hands to catch the rings. The blue ring slides into Bob's finger while the green ring falls in Cecil's finger. Bob and Cecil wait to feel the power of the rings. And then they wait some more hoping their struggle was not in vain. Finally Cecil says "You know I'm gonna call you a complete dumba--"

Suddenly Cecil become overcome with power as his ring gives him the power to...
11521.title: The Woods

choices: turn myself or others into any animal."
turn myself or others into inanimate objects."
115212.content:
Finally Cecil says "You know I'm gonna call you a complete dumba--"

Suddenly Cecil begins to shrink shorter and shorter until he is the size of a small kitten. At this point Cecil sighs and says, "Oh bother, it appears I've experienced some significant shrinkage."

"Ah, I suppose you must've not gotten any control over your new power, yet. Try to concentrate on getting back to your normal size. If that doesn't work just take the ring off."

Cecil tries to grow back to his normal size, but only manages to be the size of a ten year old child. "Ah well this is good enough, do you happen to have any more documentation on these confounded rings. Like, what specifically they do?"

"Ah, I left my Guidebook to Occult Rings in the truck, just give me moment."

Bob sifts through quite a few books such as, "How to Frame a Friend," "How to Kill your Newlywed Wife," "Five ways to Kill a Ten Year Old Boy," and "How to Get Vendetta." He finally finds the book he's looking for and says, "Eureka! Here we go, 'The Occult Ring Encyclopedia Rivendelica!'"

"Rivendelica?"

"Yes! Now let's see that ring shall we?" said Bob as he opened to a page with several colored boxes.

"That's looks like a paint catalog from Home Depot," said Cecil noticing the unusual names of colors.

"Are you questioning the book's accuracy?"

"Honestly? Yes!"

"Okay, fine! I'll give you that, but this book has you ring down perfectly! Sea Foam Green allows you to shrink others as well as yourself."

"And what about your ring."

"I'm getting to that brother! Mine is a Sky Blue Ring that allows me to..."
115212.title: Significant Shrinkage

1152122.content:
"Oh, it appears that my rings has the power to turn other people into objects." Bob said he then stroke the ring and said "I shall either use you in a plan to kill bart or turn animal in to jade figures for my wife."

"Hey! How come I got a ring that shrinks me but you got a cool ring like that?" Cecil asked.

"Luck of the draw brother." Bob uttered.

"Now lets see I think I saw another pair of rings landing in..."
1152122.title: Turn myself or others into inanimate objects."

1153.content: Hold on a minute? There's more choices? Lenny/Carl, a surprise guest, or someone else?
1153.title: More Choices?

11531.content:
Carl is sitting at the bar in Moe's tavern not really drinking a beer when Moe who is leaning behind the bar notices and turns to him.

"Heh Carl. What's up? Are yous just moping because Lenny ain't here? Co's you know I'm sure he'll turn up he's almost always here on week nights." Moe said trying to make Carl feel better. Meanwhile Barney and the rest of the bar flies continue to slowly drink their beer and Carl just sighs before replying to Moe.

"I guess I'm just worried you know. But it's really not the same without Lenny and Homer. Come to think of it where is old baldy anyway? Since when did he not go drinking here after work? Ah something is fishy here I can tell ya." Carl says before taking another swig of his beer from a pitcher.

Moe is about to respond when there is a noise of a car pulling up outside the front door of the tavern. Everyone turns around as if to say "Who's there?" and suddenly Lenny comes running in and whispers something to Carl.

"Heh what's so god damned special that you can't say it to me right here anyway?" He asks as Lenny just stands there flapping his wrists. "Oh alright I'll come with you, this place is dead tonight anyway." Carl finishes off his beer and nods to Moe before leaving with Lenny and they get into Lenny's car. Carl decides that now is the time for Lenny to give him some explanation for what is going on.

"Ok now you better explain to me what the hell is going on. I *know* somethings up. You ain't been in all night, Homer's gone god only knows where and I've had about as much as I can take of Barney, Sam and Moe for one night." Carl says to Lenny who still looking worried/excited at the same time.

Lenny composes himself then begins to speak. "Well Carl this is pretty whacky stuff but you gotta listen because this could be big I mean really big bigger than hot pants, the eight track and betamax!" Carl responds by folding his arms. "I knew it there is something going on. How come you never mentioned anything about this at work?" Lenny looks unsure then replies. "I didn't know about it then, I only discovered what happened since I got home and checked my equipment." Carl rolls his eyes. "Oh here we go, you got yourself a police scanner and all of a sudden you think your James Bond. You do realise that whatever it is the cops probably have it under control by now? Right?"

Lenny still carries on talking excitedly. "No Carl, seriously. This is bigger than anything the police can just handle. Ok explanation time. Basically a cargo aircraft with some very rare valuable artefacts exploded directly over Springfield. But get this these artefacts, rings I think they are. They're supposed to be magical! They can transform people and if you get all of them they can grant wishes!" says Lenny looking at a decidedly sceptical Carl for validation.

Carl shakes his head. "Look Lenny, I don't go in for non of this hockus pokus junk but those artefacts could be valuable. We ought to try and find some of them, best case scenario we sell em back to their owners worst case we stick em on e-bay. Either way we'll be in the money." he states looking at a disappointed Lenny.

"Well whatever Carl, but I'm telling you there's something strange about these rings. They aren't just any old random treasure. Anyway either way we could get rich off this so what do you say?" Lenny asks.

"Yeah sure lets go find em, why not otherwise we'll just waste another night getting drunk and pulling Barney out of the toilet. I'm sure Moe can do that by himself." Carl replied as Lenny started the car and they drive off to look for the rings in...
11531.title: Lenny/Carl. They're just friends!

115312.content:
They drive off through the streets of Springfield until they pass a disused building with a chain-link fence around it and a sign saying "Keep out. Scheduled for demolition." Etc. First Lenny and Carl look around the surrounding street both using metal detectors but finding nothing that resembles the TF ring/s they decide to check inside the abandoned gambling palace. "Heh, uh how do we get in anyways?" Carl asked aware that the fence is padlocked and the doors locked. "Don't worry." says Lenny. "I still got a key for one of the back doors." The duo head around the back of the architecturally lavish yet abandoned building and come upon a loading bay for trucks and wagons to unload. Lenny begins to talk as he takes out a set of keys. "See Burns forgot to ask Homer for his key back because he's always forgetting about him so I asked him if I could have it and he said yes." Lenny says as he takes a key and opens one of the smaller doors leading into the casino. The pair walk inside. It's dark as the power has been cut and as they move into what was the kitchen most of the fittings are no longer there having been removed ready for the building to be demolished. "Man this is creepy." says Carl and Lenny replies. "Yeah it really changes the acoustics of a place when you take all the stuff out doesn't it? Makes it seem like a haunted house." They head through a double door which leads them into what was one of the main gaming rooms where the slot machines, card tables and roulette used to be. Now it's just a dark empty space with the odd crate, pile of rubbish and the odd rat sniffing around.

"Ok lets split up now. I'll take this floor you go check the next one." Lenny says. "Sounds like a plan." Carl replies and they both switch on their metal detectors and begin sweeping through the abandoned building. They find nothing on the first two floors so they decide to go check the other two upper floors. Lenny is on the second floor up and Carl is on the third and top floor. One of them finds a TF ring but which one?
115312.title: Remnants.

11532.content: Only hours after the news of the rings in Springfield, a portal began to open in the woods and a figure stepped out. The figure walked away as the portal disappeared. The humanoid shape was covered in shadow so description was impossible. However, there was a golden ring attached to one of the figure's fingers. It continued to walk until it reached a cliff revealing the horizon of the town of Springfield. As it stared into the nuclear power plant of Mr. Burns, it began to think. "I know that place very well. A year after the whole ring search began, Mr. Burns possessed them all and turned the whole world into a dark empire. Luckily, years after survival and training, I was able to steal one of the rings from Mr. Burns and used it to come here. Well, Burns, you may have won in that reality, but I will prevent that from ever happening. I will collect all the rings, form the Ring of Unlimited Wishes, and use to stop you and bring peace to the world for I am Maggie Simpson."
11532.title: A Surprise Guest

115321.content: The grown woman that was Maggie walked into the woods near Evergreen Terrace to find one of the rings. Unlike most people, she can find some of the rings with ease since she already been in the same time period before. She walked until she saw a ring submerged in a puddle of water. She analyzed the ring and immediately knew it was the Ring of Age Regression. She went to pick it up when someone was approaching and it was...
115321.title: The First Ring Quest

1153211.content: Maggie stopped from picking up the ring and heard movement. After only a second of scanning the environment around her, she was surprised to see that the person's shadow appeared to have a vulture-like nose. "No! It can't be!" Maggie said shocked. However, when the moving figure appeared, he looked different. He didn't look like what he was in this modern time or the god-like figure in her time. Instead, the Mr. Burns she saw had a head more aged than she could imagine. But what really shocked her was that underneath the head was a thick cyborg body that make it seem certain that it can tear your spine like a twig. "What happened to you?" Maggie asked the cyborg. "Oh! No questions for now! I'm here for what's mine!" Burns answered her as he made a fist out of one of metallic hands. Maggie thought about what was happening for a while but then got herself an answer. "I must of tampered with the future," she said to herself. However, she knew that going back in time along wasn't enough. She knew she going to have to stop her cyborg-arch nemesis to save the world. Maggie stood up in a kung fu position and ran at him. the war has only begun but did Maggie win the battle?
1153211.title: Mr. Burns From the Future

11532112.content: Maggie launched a kick at the metallic Burn's chest cavity, but the attack only bounced back as as result. She held her leg in pain as Burns grabbed her and threw her away from the puddle. He walked over to the small pool of water and, using a magnetic pulse that came from one of his metal fingers, the ring zoomed out of water and inserted itself into it. "Excellent. Now to exterminate you, Ms. Simpson," he said turned to the fallen figure of Maggie. "Do you realize what your'e doing? Are you aware that ring is dangerous even for you?" Maggie yelled weakly. "Foolish child. Because I have a robotic body, this ring will barely do a thing to me," Burns gloated as he focused on the ring. "Hope you enjoy reliving your life, Ms. Simpson," Burns said with a demonic grin as a light flashed and Maggie felt herself change shape. She felt her body shrink as her clothes shrunk along with her until she was...
11532112.title: Mr. Burns Wins

115321121.content: As soon as the light dimmed, Maggie examined herself and saw she was only a baby again. Luckily fro her, the blue dress she wore now fit her her new small size. Maggie tried to think of a way out of this. But what were the odds of a small infant defeating a giant robot Burns. "Now you will be easier to crush," said Burns as he raised his foot to hover over Maggie. She then remembered about the Rings of Time Travel in her possession and quickly concentrated on its energy. When Burns stomped onto the ground, he raised his foot up to see what was left of her but he saw that she has disappeared. Where, or more likely, when did Maggie go?
115321121.title: Infant Future Maggie

1153211211.content: Maggie opened her eyes to see that the cyborg Mr. Burns was no longer there. She crawled near the rain puddle and saw that the ring was still there. Maggie went to pick up the ring once more when she suddenly heard noises. Did she continue to reach for the ring or did she flee?
1153211211.title: Only A Few Minutes Ago

11532112112.content: Maggie figured it was best to leave for now when she crawled as fast as she can. As soon as she hid at a tree, her past yet older self came by to examine the ring. Later, the cyborg Mr. Burns also walked over to her paradox duplicate. Maggie knew that now was a good time to run, or crawl. She pressured herself to get away as a light came from behind her and her past self regressed into a baby like she did. When Maggie finally exited the woods, she sighed in relief and continued to crawl. She eventually ended up in her old home when...
11532112112.title: Maggie Fled

1153211212.content: Maggie looked at world around to see she was going through a wormhole. "That was close," Maggie thought to herself. Just then, the wormhole torn itself apart when a light covered her vision. When Maggie rubbed her saw, she was awed to see that the forest she's in looks...
1153211212.title: Many Years Ago

115321122.content: Maggie was relieved that she didn't up in her infant years. But, she was also scared that she was now only a 9-year-old. She backed away from Burns when he held up one of his robotic arms. "Say goodbye Ms. Simpson!" Burns roared when his metal plates of his arm reorganized themselves into a plasma cannon. Just as the cannon began to charge a shining ball of energy that will soon fire, survival seemed to be slim for Maggie. Burns fired the cannon while Maggie tried to run away. A giant ball of fire destroyed tree and made craters on the earth. But when the smoke cleared, Maggie was seen...
115321122.title: 9-Year-Old Maggie

1153211221.content: Mr. Burns was shocked to find Maggie safe from harm on top of a tree branch that didn't get blasted by his energy blast. "But how did you...?" Mr. Burns questioned when Maggie interrupted him. "I have lived through your terror for over twenty years. I trained as a secret agent in the arts of kung fu to one day stop your cruel empire. Now I will do the world a favor by eliminating you!" Maggie said as she leaped off the tree and attacked the cyborg with great skill even for someone in a 9-year-old body. Maggie dodged every punch and weaponry Burns threw at her. But eventually, Maggie brought out a...
1153211221.title: Alive

choices: Accidently put the ring of AR on her finger.
Put the ring in her inside pocket and figured out what to do now.
11532112211.content:
As the fight dragged on the mechanical Mr Burns swung wildly at Maggie with his mechanical arm and she expertly dodged his attack then removed a small strange looking device with a detonator attached to it. As Burns was still recovering from his miss Maggie dived between his mechanical legs spun around and clamped the bomb onto the back of the cyborg.

Then she ran and didn't look back.

Meanwhile Mr Burns realised something was on his back and tried frantically to remove it but his main mechanical arms could not bend far enough to reach around his back and before he could deploy and extra reserve arms the device exploded in a thunderous explosion.

Maggie stopped running and leaned on a tree for a second as she heard a blast and an object came flying through the air and landed a few feet away from the heavy breathing nine year old. It was Mecha Burns hand and on one of it's fingers was the ring of age regression. Maggie smiled and stopped down to pick up the ring just as she did another object landed not far from her. It was Mr Burns head.

Despite herself Maggie couldn't help but laugh as Mr Burns growled some insult at her and began to disappear back into the timestream. As he did Maggie...
11532112211.title: Bombing shoot'in burning looting...

11532112212.content: "Now I am getting mad!" Burns roared when he transformed his arm into a plasma cannon again. Maggie took out a rod-like object that instantly expanded to make a bazooka. Just as both Burn's and Maggie's weapons charged, Mr. Burns said with triumph, "So long." Before Burns could fire, however, Maggie's weapon fired to release a green goo. Just when the energy of Burn's cannon prepared to fire, the goo attached itself to the cannon's inside. "No!" Burns could only yell just when the energy of his cannon got stuck and blasted him instead. Nothing could be seen for a while, but when the smoke cleared, mechanical parts rained from the mid-air. Soon, Mr. Burns metallic head fell right in front of Maggie which startled her. "You may have won this round, but no one stops Charles Montgomery Burns!" Burns yelled in rage. That's when...
11532112212.title: Victor of This Round

choices: find the Ring of Age Progression.
115321122121.content: Mr. Burns opened a compartment in his metal skull to reveal a mechanical claw. The claw zoomed and grabbed the Ring of Age Regression that was along with the debris of his broken robot body. "I'll be back," Burns said calmly as his head vanished in a coat of energy along with the claw and ring. Maggie was happy to know nothing will get her in danger for a while. But she knew that Future Burns and the Burns in the present are still in large. Plus, she also knew that she was a 9-year-old. Maggie thought about what to do and came to the conclusion that she should...
115321122121.title: Burn's Head Teleported Away

1153211221211.content:
After thinking about it Maggie immediately knew she had to find the ring of Age Progression. She wanted to find it both to turn herself back into and adult and to deny it to Mr Burns who obviously wanted it along with the other rings for his evil plans. Maggie all so hoped that no one recognised her although since she was only a baby in this year of history perhaps she would get away with it. Then again she could be mistaken for her sister Lisa who was about this age at the current time so she thought it best to keep a low profile.

Maggie searched around the rest of the woods quickly just in case she'd missed something but found nothing so she decided to head for another location to find the AP ring.

Where did Maggie go to search?
1153211221211.title: A personal and professional quest.

choices: tamper with the age regression ring.
find the ring of age progression.
115321122122.content: Maggie grew angry and pick up am metal rod that was part of Burn's robotic body. "Die!" she yelled charging at her arch-nemesis. "No!" Burns only yelled as the metal head was impaled and exploded. Maggie fell over from the recoil but saw that her enemy's head parts scattered into metal parts and a brain with fluids and electricity escaped from what was left. Maggie realized that her arch-nemesis is destroyed, but she knew that she knew that the real burns still lives on and that she was still 9. She walked over to where the Ring of Age Regression was and picked up from the rest of the debris. Unfortunately for her, she never knew where the Ring of Age Progression was hidden so she decided to...
115321122122.title: Maggie killed Mr. Burns.

choices: She goes to check in on her past self. Maybe she has it.
She goes to Burns manor and searchs for the ring there.
1153211221222.content:
Maggie had never been able to find the ring of Age Progression before but suddenly two distinct possibilities stuck out in her mind as to why. One was that perhaps somehow her past self had found it and hidden it in her crib before forgetting about it. After all as a baby she wouldn't even know what it did or that it was magic. Another possibility is that she hadn't found it because the Mr Burns of this time had already found it and was hiding it somewhere probably at his manor or maybe even the nuclear power plant.

Maggie knew that either of these where real possibilities to explain why she couldn't find the AP ring but which one should she investigate first?
1153211221222.title: The elusive ring.

choices: He goes on a rampage, soon the whole of springfield is his own personal brothel.
he searches for the other rings first.
11533.content: Mayor Quimby was relaxing in his garden when an explosion was heard over head. Out of the fireball came several rings, one of which fell directly into the mayor's swimming pool. He jumped in to retrieve it, he never could resist shiny things. Putting it on he felt the power surge through him, and fly from his hand hitting his nearby attendant. The attendant fell over in pain and then vanished in a puff of smoke. In his place was a beautiful woman, the mayor had found something that could make his best wish come true, a way to turn the whole world into beautiful women.
11533.title: Someone Else

choices: Make Marge gain weight until she is fatter than Homer.
Inflate Bart like a helium balloon.
Shrink Homer until he is smaller than the kids.
12.content:
In Springfield there is a house that was haunted, built on an indian burial ground and once owned by Michael Jackson. Needless to say it was a scary frightful place where strange supernatural misfortunes happened to those that dared enter.

 
Of course none of this put Homer J Simpson the bald head of the Simpson family off from buying the house and moving his family in right away. What could possibly go wrong after all!

 
"Mmmmmrrr..I don't like the looks of this place." Commented Marge as the Simpson family entered the door of the house for the first time. Their moving truck stood outside containing their possessions and Marge wasn't as bothered about leaving their old house as she thought she would be but still something about this seemed wrong somehow. Aside that is from the fact that this place was just really gothic and creepy. Neither of those where things Marge has ever cared for much, not darkness nor gothic style.

 
"MARGE!"

 
She was snapped out of her contemplation by the sound of her husband shouting her from the houses kitchen.

 
"Marge, come here. You gotta see this kitchen. It's nearly as big as our old TV room!" Homer commented stupidly.

 
Marge shrugged her shoulders and headed into the kitchen while Bart and Lisa carried on unloading their things from the car. Maggie followed Marge probably more out of habit than anything, Marge noticed this and picked her up before she headed into the kitchen where Homer was.

 
"Homer, I'm telling you again. I don't like this place. It was not just the darkness when we viewed it. There's something.. wrong with this house. Are you SURE the relater told you everything? I mean I *know* how many lies they have to tell from the time I used to work as one for a while." Marge said to her husband who was busy admiring the grill.

 
"Ppffft. Marge, you know me and facts. You can use facts to prove pretty much anything. Besides you worry too much. This house is great! We're finally getting something for all the years of hard work and saving." Homer blathered.

 
Marge nearly rolled her eyes but then she half expected a half assed answer from her husband on this matter so she retrained herself. "Well Homer I just hope your right because I still think this place is just creepy. There's something really wrong about it." Marge folded her arms convinced they where probably in for some kind of ghosts or something or vengeful spirits.

 
If Marge had known the truth then she'd have run screaming from the house and taken Homer and the kids with her. For you see this house has a mind of it's own but more than that it has supernatural powers enabling it to transform anyone within it in any way it sees fit at any time. It wasn't doing anything at the moment because it was watching is newest occupants with interest but later that day it decided to...
12.title: The haunted house of transformation!

choices: Marge begins to expand even more.
Marge transforms in some way other than expansion.
Someone from her family comes in and sees her.
121.content:
Marge was sitting on the bed in the master bedroom reading a book when she began to feel an odd sensation spreading through her body. Marge put the book down in shock and began to look at herself just as she felt bloated and began to expand outwards as if she was rapidly gaining weight. At first she just sat there getting bigger but soon she got to her feet and found she was indeed heavier. Marge put her hands to her middle and found that as her belly expanded under her hands it didn't feel like just normal fat because it was too firm. Marge thought this must be some sort of allergic reaction so she walked towards the bathroom, soon her walk became a waddle as she grew bigger, wider and rounder the rest of her body ballooning along with her belly now sticking out several feet in front of her.

By the time Marge got to the medicine cabinet in the bathroom she was beginning to realise that this was something unusual and not just an allergic reaction. She had swollen to over 300lb and even more strangely her cloths had grown with her, her dress, necklace, shoes etc all seemed to fit her perfectly although Marge knew looking down at herself they should have burst off her a long time ago. Marge looked down at her tubby body and grunted as she watched herself gain at least another hundred pounds putting her at about 450lb! She was HUGE! An enormous housewife wearing a massive green dress, her necklace and her shoes had turned into very large plastic sandals. Still Marge realised that her gain had stopped at least for the time being and this gave her time to examine herself properly in the bathroom mirror. It felt wrong, Marge knew she was a thin woman, an attractive woman not what she was looking at which was an enormously huge FAT WOMAN! At least Marge assumed it was fat, it certainly didn't jiggle or bounce like fat should. Damn it how did she get so big?

This thought aside Marge's mind was racing. What happened to me? Why did my cloths grow too? What will Homer think of this? Can I get back to normal? What will the kids think of this?

Marge decided that she needed to get help for her condition so she began to slowly waddle out of the bathroom back into the master bedroom but as she passed by the bed she stopped when she heard an ominous noise coming from..somewhere..coming from..from her?

Soon the hissing noise got louder and was accompanied by an attendant creaking noise as Marge began to feel lighter all of a sudden. This would have been good news for her mobility was it not for the fact that she began to feel puffier as well. It was getting harder and harder to walk and move her hands. As Marge got lighter and lighter she began to realise why. She was inflating, she was blowing up, becoming nothing more than a big round balloon.

Marge's body inflated and began to swell as it floated up from the bedroom floor only inches at first but soon ascending several feet into the air. Marge's feet and hands flapped uselessly as she floated completely helpless and still expanding. Bigger, wider, rounder she gets and at the same time her arms and legs are absorbed into her body as it begins to take on a spherical shape. Marge wondered how her cloths where still coping with all this expansion and for that matter how much bigger she would get and what else was in store for her.

Click.

12232112222.content:
When Homer saw what had happened, he flipped out, instantly vowing sobriety. His wife now wore pale green overalls and red anklet socks. And at three years of age, she also donned a diaper. "Homey..." she croaked as her husband passed out. The last thought in his mind was that this was just a drunken illusion. Maggie's hair had grown out in spiky blonde layers. Her baggie had been replaced with a sky blue shift-style dress, and on her feet were flats. She took stock of her situation and decided she needed to take charge of this family. First, she fed Baby Lisa a bottle, and then changed her into a fresh diaper and a sleeper, before tucking her into what had been Maggie's crib. Then she put little Margie and Bart into the tub, giving them a bedtime bath. It appeared to help them relax, especially Marge, who was overly worried and rightly so. With Homer passed out on the couch and the other kids' beds not yet prepared, Maggie decided to tuck the toddlers into her parents' bed with her. After dressing them in clean diapers and smaller-sized clothing (which was difficult for Bart because there were only baby girl clothes), she tucked little Margie and Bart into bed with her, and even donated something from her former stash to make their transition easier: two brand-new red pacifiers.

Long before infant Lisa awoke expecting a feeding, Maggie knew she had to get up. She recognized the odor emanating from the toddlers in bed with her. She knew the smell, as just hours before, she had been a baby, pooping in her diapers. But now, as an adult, it seemed more repugnant. As a baby, Maggie hadn't realized how badly it smelled to others. Trying not to awaken the tots, she quickly changed her mom's and Bart's stinky diapers. Then she went downstairs to fix Lisa a bottle. When it had warmed, Maggie headed back upstairs to the nursery, stopping only to cover her snoring father with a blanket. "G'night, Dad," Maggie whispered. "Goodnight, Maggie," Homer mumbled in his sleep. His youngest-born child did a double-take at that, before bringing Lisa her bottle. When Maggie reached the crib, Lisa was stirring in her own poopy diaper. She awoke and whimpered while Maggie changed her. Once Lisa was clean again, Maggie fed her a bottle, stopping to burp her occasionally. Then just as Lisa began to fill her diaper again, something weird happened.....

She groaned as she inflated too much for her body to handle. Having reached her limits, Maggie exploded into tiny little pieces, that fell silently and slowly to the ground.

Having heard the sound of the explosion, Bart (As well as the rest of the family) realized what happened.

"-I should've stayed the hell away from this house.. If I knew THAT would happen, I would've never bought it... It's all my fault... said Homer, guiltily, and incredibly sad
-It's not yours (Not entirely at least), that's the house's ! answered Lisa. If we could destroy it, maybe things would go back to normal ! answered Lisa, with a crying voice
-Do you really think so ?!
-Well, there is a chance..."

After hearing those words, Homer got in a beastly rage and shouted :

"LET'S TEAR THIS GODDAMN HOUSE APART !!!"

Lisa didn't completely believe that destroying the house would bring her sister back, but she also did her best at destroying the house. They went insane : they broke everything breakable, they set the curtains on fire, they even borrowed (Err, I mean, stole) explosives to blow the crap out of this house !

After a few hours, absolutely nothing remained of the house, not even a single brick. A minute later Bart suddenly felt funny, as his arms and legs got longer, and his voice got deeper. Soon enough, Bart was a 10 year old boy again ! And if destroying the house brought Bart back to normal, then...

"Maggie !!!!!"

The Simpsons ran back to their original house and headed straight to Maggie's room. They opened the door, and miraculously, she was there ! She didn't seem to remember how her big brother became her little brother, and how she inflated and exploded into pieces. She was sleeping peacefully, like nothing happened.

The Simpsons hugged her for a long time. Maggie seemed to wonder why they hugged her like that, though.

From now on, the family promised themselves to stay the hell away from any creepy looking house, to prevent this kind of stuff from ever happening again.

Maggie's fingers and toes looked like small spheres on her overinflated arms and legs, Lisa's feet and hands were absorbed into her legs and arms, both girls' bodies became almost completely ball-like in shape, and both looked like comically overinflated cartoon versions of themselves. A bystander would probably have laughed at how ridiculous they looked, but their inflation was serious, especially when it started to slow down. Lisa knew this could only mean one thing : they were about to burst. She tried her best to waddle her arms and legs to get around, but they were too big to get her anywhere.

"I can't... hold... the pressure !"

Eventually, the unavoidable thing happened, and their bodies reached their limits. Maggie exploded one body part at a time, while Lisa exploded like a bomb, all of her body parts popping at once, like a grand finale following Maggie's fireworks-like explosion. Yellow, red and blue pieces of fabric, as well as Maggie's ribbon and Lisa's sandals and white pearls, slowly fell down on the floor as a creepy laugh resounded in the now empty room.

"Ah, this feels so good ! I haven't laughed this hard in centuries ! And I've also obtained a good deal of fear energy out of these two, this is just wonderful ! Now, to think about what to do next... Oh, but first things first..."

The room was suddenly bathed in a blinding white light. When it was gone, Lisa and Maggie were back to normal, sleeping in beds that had just been materialized by the house's powers. While it may seem nonsensical to do that, the house actually hated to kill people for good : it liked to scare{/i } its victims so as to feed off its victims' fear energy.

"There, that takes care of that ! Now to find my next victim..."

"Hey Bartina, are the lights too bright?" said one girl, as the others laughed. Bart opened his eyes, then immediately closed them again at the sight of at topless girl. Then, he realised something. Shouldn't he be being turned on by that girl he had just seen?
He opened his eyes again, and smiled at the girl standing topless in front of him. She was wearing nothing on her bottom half either, and yet Bart was not getting the familiar male arousal he had been used to all his life. He walked over to one of the benches and sat down, opening his swimming bag. His surprise at his lack of arousal was nothing compared to what he found in the bag. Instead of his normal swimming trunks, there was a skimpy two piece bikini!
Bart was about to shout his protest, when he realised where he was.
