First things first, the Simpsons needed to find shelter and extra food, in case they don't find help until they run out or Homer eats them all overnight. Marge, Lisa and Maggie went to try and find fruit and other types of fruit, while Homer and Bart stayed on the beach in case a boat passed by.

Unfortunately, Marge and Lisa's search wasn't going very well, as none of the trees or bushed they saw had fruit that looked edible. Most of them looked poisonous, and others seemed downright rotten, and they didn't want to risk tasting them in case they were as dangerous as they looked. Eventually, they found a strange flower. It had a small, round head that looked like a soft ping-pong ball. Lisa got closer to the flower and touched its head out of curiosity, and to her surprise, the flower head burst like a miniature balloon, releasing a cloud of dust. Instinctively, Marge grabbed her daughter by the hand and ran away as fast as she could. However, while Marge and Maggie managed to avoid breathing the dust, Lisa didn't, as she was directly in front of the flower when it burst. When the cloud dissipated, Marge asked:

"Whew, I didn't expect this flower to burst like that... Are you OK, sweetie?
-I kinda feel light-headed, but aside from that, I'm fine. Good thing I didn't breathe in too much of the dust...
-We should hurry back to the beach. Hopefully your father and your brother found a boat, or at least a nice spot for us to make a shelter..."

They headed back to the beach, but the more she walked, the worse Lisa felt. She didn't pay much attention to it at first as she thought finding food and shelter was more important, but eventually she felt so dizzy she had trouble standing up. The dust's true effects showed not long afterwards, as Lisa was starting to transform. But how was she transforming?

1433.content:
Bob decided that he'd have a better chance if he worked with his brother Cecil who shared his grudge against Bart Simpson and to a less extent the other Simpson’s. They had a pre arranged meeting place that they would meet if Bob ever escape from jail and soon enough Bob managed to hot wire a car and drive out to it. It was a remote pool near a sewage outlet from the power plant where Homer had found the dead body of Mr Smithers father all those years ago but today it was a place for Bob and Cecil to meet up.

Bob parked his stolen truck at the side of the road then touched it and imagined it turning into a toy version of itself. It quickly shrunk down until it was the size of a kid’s toy and then Bob picked it up and pocketed it. "Well well. I guess I'll never have to worry about parking again." He said to himself smugly and then set off into the woods. Before long he arrives at the area where Cecil should be and sure enough his brother emerges from the woods to greet him. "Bob. You finally escaped from prison. What took you so long?" Cecil says as Bob looks at him and rolls his eyes. "Very funny Cecil. Now are you interested in helping me nail that brat Bart Simpson and his meddling sister Lisa or not?" Bob asks. "Well actually brother its funny you should mention that because I was hoping to talk you out of that very course of action." Cecil replies. "WHAT? But Cecil I need my revenge! You ended up in jail too because of those meddling kids!" Bob says becoming irate. Cecil just sighs and responds "Bob. Going after Bart right away is what the police will be expecting you to do. They'll set a trap for you then unload so many bullets into you it makes the gun fight at the okey coral look like reasonable use of force. Surely even you can see that?" Bob rubs his chin for a moment and says "Yes. You may have a point. That is what they would expect me to do. Go to the boys house or school to get revenge on him. There has to be another way." Cecil shakes his head. "I doubt it Bob. I doubt Marge could allow her two older children out of her sight until you are caught or she believes you are a long way away and no threat." Bob replies "Well there must be SOME way of nailing those brats. We just need a plan. A diversion of an opportune moment when they'll be away from home or school and vulnerable. Or I could use my powers in some way."

The brothers continue discussing the problem of how to get to Bart and Lisa for revenge and eventually come up with several plans.

1: Hack into the government computer system and send the police in Springfield a false report that Sideshow Bob has been sighted in a city in South America. Maybe the cops will stop protecting Bart if they think Bob has fled the country.
2: Wait for Bart and Lisa to go on a school trip or wait for the Simpson's to go on holiday then ambush them.
3: Bob and Cecil exploit Bob's powers to disguise themselves at police and then get close to Bart and his sister.

1451221121.title: Lisa's Muscular Virus

14512211211.content:
The morning after the explosion, Lisa woke up with an uncomfortable stiffness in her entire body. She rubbed her arms to loosen them up, figuring she was feeling the results of the previous night's accident. She was technically correct, just not in the way she expected. She climbed out of bed and headed for the bathroom, absentmindedly tugging at the sleeves of her nightgown, which felt just a little bit tight around the shoulders...

The school day passed fairly uneventfully...until gym. Lisa's class trudged into the gymnasium, dressed in their uniforms. (Lisa's felt oddly snug, though she presumed it had merely shrunk a bit in the wash.) Lisa groaned inwardly at the sight of the dodgeballs littering the hardwood floor. "The most dreaded of all P.E. sports..." she quietly muttered. Ms. Pommelhorst, the gym teacher, blew her whistle, and the class fell into line. "It's dodgeball day, class!" Ms. Pommelhorst bellowed. "You know the rules, so split into the two teams and start pummeling each other!"

Lisa shuffled to the nearest side of the scotch-tape line dividing the floor and closed her eyes, awaiting the inevitable. She didn't wait long. Mere moments after Ms. Pommelhorst signaled the start of the first game, Lisa heard the unmistakable sound of a dodgeball making contact and felt the hard rubber ball strike her body. Strangely, this time the feeling didn't instantly leave as usual. She opened her eyes and looked down. The ball was wedged firmly between her hands. She had caught the ball without even trying!

She looked around. Her classmates were too busy trying to hit each other to notice her sudden display of athleticism. She shrugged, gripped the ball with one hand, and pulled her arm back. She really didn't know why she was bothering; she threw even worse than she dodged. Still... she thought as she hurled the ball with all her might. Much to her surprise, the ball zoomed across the gym and knocked Ralph Wiggum clean off his feet. That got the class's attention.

"Oh my god!" Lisa shouted. "Ralph, are you okay?" Without moving from his position on the floor, Ralph brightly responded, "The lights make everything like a collider-scope!" Lisa exhaled in relief. Ralph was fine...relatively speaking. Then she realized the entire class was staring at her in mute shock. She blushed sheepishly. Someone on the other team dropped the ball they were holding. It rolled across the floor and came to a rest against Lisa's foot. She bent down, picked it up...and felt a predatory smirk spread across her face as she looked at the other team.

The class played five rounds of dodgeball that period, and in all five rounds Lisa dominated the game, singlehandedly demolishing the other team. By the third round, the rest of her team just huddled in the back, gawking at the girl who had suddenly changed from bookworm to dodgeball machine. Some of the students swore that the few times Lisa missed her target, she left dents in the wall. Ms. Pommelhorst was ecstatic that she had finally "gotten through" to Lisa. Everyone kept their distance from her as the class headed back to Ms. Hoover's room, and Lisa felt an odd mix of pride and embarrassment over what had happened. And for the life of her, she just couldn't figure out where this sudden rush of power had come from...
14512211211.title: Day One

145122112111.content:
That evening, the Simpson family gathered around the dinner table. Lisa was at ease. Beyond the shocked stares of her classmates, the day had held no other unusual events. She had tried to convince herself that what had happened in gym was just a fluke, and that she would be her old unathletic self again by next week's class. It hadn't worked, but once home, she was able to put it out of her mind. Until...

"So, Lisa," Marge asked, "how was school today?"

Lisa gulped. Fortunately, she was chewing a mouthful of food at the time, so it didn't call any undue attention. "Oh, you know," she responded with an unconvincing casualness, "it was... normal. Nothing out of the ordinary happening." Seated beside her, Bart snorted. "That's not what I heard." Lisa's mouth went dry as she silently cursed the playground grapevine. She should've realized how quickly reports of the gym incident would've spread across the student body.

Marge looked at her son in confusion. "What do you mean, Bart? Did something happen?" Ignoring his sister's whispered pleas for mercy, Bart elaborated: "Well, it seems that our beloved brainiac here discovered her inner jock during gym today. The way I heard it, Lisa was throwing dodgeballs so hard, she put holes in the wall and sent four kids to the hospital!" Marge gasped in shock. Reflexively clutching her fork tight, Lisa stood up, glared right in her brother's face, and bellowed, "I DID NOT!"

The silence that followed was deafening. The family hadn't heard Lisa yell like that since, well...ever. Unwilling to put up with awkward stares for the second time that day, Lisa quietly excused herself and ran up to her room, slamming the door and locking it. Great, she thought bitterly. It was bad enough the whole school thought she was a freak by now. She didn't need her idiot brother convincing their parents she was turning into some thug. She sank to the floor and wrapped her arms around her knees. The feel of metal against her skin made her realize she was still holding her fork. She unclenched her hand and gasped. The fork was mangled and bent out of shape, the dents lining up with her fingers! "What is happening to me?!" she wondered aloud.
145122112111.title: That night...

choices: Lisa lifts more and more weight and her muscles expand
1451221121111.content:
The next morning started no better. The nightgown which was tight the night before barely fit now and had ripped out some stitches. And as she pulled it off she looked in the mirror and could tell why. Her shoulders were wider. And the reason they were wider was because her muscles were bigger. Not a lot, but enough. In fact as she let out a surprised gasp as she noticed that her chest had swelled slightly, pressing hard against her underwear. Lisa rubbed her stomach and felt unfamiliar lumps that she quickly surmised was an underlying six pack, ready to press forward into view. Not that she was going to be showing it to anyone. Raising her arm she gasped as she flexed and a small but noticeable bicep popped up above the plane of her arm with an equally thick tricep to balance the bicep out. Her muscles couldn’t compete with the likes of Nelson, but she was convinced they were as big as Bart’s. If not bigger. Smiling riley at the thought, she still had to let out a nervous sigh. Her dress would be stressed against her newly added muscles.

Digging through her dresser she found an athletic top she had taken from her mom months before for some type of dress up show. The top was thick and stretchable, and as she pulled it on, it was a bit big. But that wasn’t all bad since it hung down to her waist instead of exposing any of her stomach. Her arms were still bare, but as long as she didn’t flex for anyone she figured she’d be OK. She then pulled on a pair of loose fitting shorts that no longer felt so loose, but still covered up her legs to her knees. Slipping on her sandals, Lisa slumped down the stairs to join the family for breakfast.

Reaching the table, she mumbled a good morning and picked up the cereal box and dumped some in the waiting bowl, added milk and munched away. Bart looked over at her and snickered.

“What’s up with workout outfit? Looking for another dodgeball game already?”

Lisa shot him daggers with her eyes, but simply responded with a muffled “No.”

Marge looked her over. “Sweety, why aren’t you wearing your dress?”

Lisa looked up at her mother with pained eyes. “I just wanted to wear something different today.”

Not looking to pry just yet, Marge nodded, but let out her worried moan. Lisa stared back at her bowl and finished her breakfast. Grabbing her lunch and backpack she ran for the door with Bart and getting on the bus, she headed for the back and stared at the ground, unwilling to make eye contact and ignoring the whispers from the other kids.

Once Lisa made it to class she let out a sigh of relief. At least she could concentrate on her studies. Then maybe later she could look into what was happening to her. However, the class had barely begun when Principal Skinner’s voice came over the loudspeaker.

“Lisa Simpson, please report to the Principal’s office.”

The rest of the class let out “ooohs” and other jeers. Sighing, Lisa walked out of the room and was soon being led into Skinner’s office. There were three men in suits standing off the side. The two huge men on either side had on sunglasses and looked menacing. The one in the middle looked ex-military, probably an officer. Lisa looked at Principal Skinner with concern.

“I didn’t intend to hurt anyone yesterday, honest. It was just that I never felt that athletic before.”

Principal Skinner let out a familiar “Hmmmmm.”

He paused for a moment, shooting a glance toward the stern looking men. “Well that may be Lisa, but apparently enough parents heard about it from their children and now these men from the government would like to ask you a few questions.”

The man in the middle, Agent Jones stepped forward and did just that. He was direct, but sounded friendly. Lisa answered all of the questions about what happened yesterday, but didn’t elaborate or let them know about her newfound muscles. Eventually, Agent Jones looked back at Skinner.

“Tell you what. Let’s head to the gym and see what this little girl can do. But from what I can see, there is nothing that abnormal about any of this.”

Skinner nodded his head and Lisa let out a sigh of relief. Now all she had to do was convince them that she wasn’t any stronger than a normal 7 year old girl and they would leave.

The men had set up a bench press just for her with more weights than she had remembered ever seeing in the gym. Shaking that off, Lisa did as they instructed and was soon bench pressing 50 pounds. The weight felt light, but she pretended to struggle. Lisa racked the weight and professed to the difficulty. With that Agent Jones grunted.

“She may be fit for a girl. But she’s nothing special. Those parents must have been exaggerating.”

If Lisa had left things alone, then all would have been back to normal. But it was his tone. And his words. “for a girl”. She was sick of hearing those words.

Lisa is smart “for a girl”.

Lisa can play the saxophone very well “for a girl”.

The predatory feeling from the dodgeball game returned and as Agent Jones droned on, Lisa interrupted him.

“You know what Agent Jones. I think I’m feeling a bit stronger after all. Why don’t you add some more weight and let me try again.”

Agent Jones shot her a quizzical look, but nodded his head to the other two, who quickly added 10 pounds to either side. As Lisa slid back under the bar, Agent Jones snickered. “Now don’t hurt yourself little girl.”

Lisa growled. Little girl, huh? She’d show him what this little girl was made of.

And as she reached for the bar she felt her strength well within her and she knew that she was going to be able to lift this weight. And a lot more.
1451221121111.title: Day Two

14512211211112.content:
Lisa gripped the bar, ready to wipe that condescending smile off Agent Jones' face. Before she could lift, however, a deafening ringing filled the room. "The fire alarm!" Skinner gasped. "Everyone out!" He quickly hustled Lisa and the three men outside, where the classes had already begun to gather.

Once among the other students, Lisa quietly slipped away from the adults and watched from a distance as Skinner and Jones talked. She couldn't hear what was being said, but after a few exchanges, Jones and the two larger men left. Lisa sighed in relief (why, she wasn't quite sure), but suddenly jumped when someone tapped her shoulder. She spun around to find Bart, looking quite pleased with himself.

"Don't do that!" she hissed. "Fine way to talk to someone who just saved your hide, sis," Bart replied, mock-offended. "What do you mean?" Lisa asked. "Duh! Think about it, Lis," Bart said, "I saw those guys taking you to the gym. Something weird happens and a bunch of creepy suits show up? I bet those guys were totally from some secret government agency. If I hadn't pulled the fire alarm, they probably would've hauled you off to some secret lab for all kinds of freaky tests and stuff!"

"So, you pulled the alarm, eh, Simpson?" Skinner intoned, looming up behind Bart. "I should've guessed. Off to detention with you!" So saying, he grabbed Bart by the arm and dragged him away, leaving Lisa with her thoughts as the classes began to file back into the school. The more she thought about what Bart said, the more sense it made. She barely understood what was happening to her. If she had continued to let Jones get to her, who knows what would've happened. Jones certainly didn't seem like the benevolent sort...

As she headed back into the building, Lisa felt a slight chill in the air. Winter's finally starting, she thought. At least now I can wear more concealing clothes without anyone getting suspicious. She just hoped her winter clothes would be baggy enough to hide any further growth spurts for the time being. Now that she thought about it, Lisa realized she had no idea when or if she would stop growing, how big she would grow, or even what her rate of growth was. She resolved to start taking note on her condition when she got home.
14512211211112.title: Saved by the Bell

choices: Bart finds a way out and they make a quick exit
Lisa grows super strong before the agents enter
145122112111121.content:
The rest of the day was less eventful, although the other children continued to point, stare and go hush when Lisa approached. She made it back home and immediately ran up to her room to take some measurements.

Pulling out a tape measurer and a ruler, Lisa noted her height and let out a sigh of relief when she saw that it was unchanged. But when she started taking measurements across her body, she became worried. Not from the measurements per se, but from hard muscles bulging when she flexed them. Her legs were thicker now than they were even yesterday; and when she flexed them, the muscles below surged to the surface and formed intimidating slabs. Her calves were now small balls of muscle. As she moved up, her abs were now flat and hard and when she tensed them, the outline of the muscle blocks that would form a six pack were clearly seen. Bringing her arm up, she wrapped the tape around her lower arm and tensed, gasping at the lemon sized muscle that bulged up above the plane of her arm. She looked at the tape. 8 inches. The number didn’t mean as much as the shape. Lisa knew her muscle was bigger than it was just yesterday. But strangely, the more she pumped her arm the less afraid she became. After all, she reasoned, bigger muscles, more strength, less chance of bullies. After a few more pumps a small vein began to rise up along her arm and for the first time today, she smiled.

“Whoa, that’s quite an arm you’ve got there Lis.”

Lisa flushed red and releasing her flex, letting the tape fall to the ground. “Bart!”

“That’s my name, don’t wear it out.” He smiled and turned his head. “Figure out what’s going on yet?”

Lisa sighed with excitement and fear. “Oh Bart, I haven’t. My muscles appear to be growing bigger, but I don’t really know how much or if that means I’m getting stronger.”

Bart stepped into the room and looked at the tape measurer. “Well if you need some help, I’ll do it.”

Lisa smiled at Bart. “Well, to start with, you could help me finish up my measurements. I just need to go around my chest and then I’ll at least have a baseline for today.”

Bart nodded his head, picked up the tape and tossed it over her head, pulling the end to the middle of her back.

“Well if you want to test your strength, all of those weights are still in the gym. I saw that creepy guy talking to Skinner again while I was in detention. I tried to sneak in closer, but by the time I did, he had left.”

As Lisa wrote down the last of the measurements, Bart dropped the tape. She turned toward him and gave him an out of place smile. The predatory Lisa had returned. “I would love to try and lift those weights. I felt really strong when you pulled the fire alarm. I feel even stronger now. After dinner, we can say we’re going to the library and head there instead.”

Bart gave her a curious look. “Sneak out on a school night and lie to Mom and Dad? Whatever is happening to you, I like the new Lisa.”

Lisa turned sullen. “Uh, no Bart. It’s, you know, for science. And to find out what is happening to me.”

Bart chuckled and turned to head out of the room. “Whatever. But since there’s a mystery to solve, our normal pact for such things apply.”

Lisa sighed, but then brightened. “Right. Truce on all previous fights until the mystery is solved.” Lisa then blushed. “Thanks Bart.”

Bart was already in the hallway. “No problemo. But you’ll have to do the talking to convince Mom we’re heading to the Library. Dad won’t care, but Mom will be suspicious.”

Dinner went smoothly until Marge asked Lisa if anything unusual happened at school. When she began to stutter, Bart jumped in about a fire alarm, neglecting to mention his involvement or the detention. Once assurances were made that everyone was OK, Lisa brought up the library and a science project and that she needed Bart’s help. Homer laughed.

“Bart? Are you sure?”

Lisa nodded quickly. “Yes. You could say we’re working on a mystery.”

Marge, seeming to sense that something was up but trusting her children, simply nodded. “Well OK, but be back before dark.”

With that both kids chimed a “Thanks Mom!”, jumped off the table and ran out the door.

Jumping on their bikes they pedaled quickly, with Lisa staying in the lead. Her bigger muscles propelled her forward and she was parking her bike when a breathless Bart skidded up.

“Wow, Lis. That has to the fastest I’ve ever seen you pedal. Something is definitely going on.”

Lisa blushed, realizing what had just happened. “Uh, yeah, I guess.” Scratching her head Lisa walked toward the door. “So how do we get in? The door must be locked.”

Bart smiled and pulled out a key. “I’m sure it is. Too bad Skinner can’t afford to change the locks though.”

Bart walked up, unlocked the door and held it for Lisa as she slipped in. “Bart, how did you…” She paused and shook her head. “Never mind.”

Bart chuckled as they turned into the gym. The bar was still resting on the holder, apparently untouched. As they walked closer, Bart looked over at the weights.

“Gee Lisa, check out the size of those plates. How much weight did they think you could lift?”

Lisa shrugged her shoulders and pulled off her coat. She was still wearing the same outfit from this morning. “I don’t know Bart, but I believe it’s time to find out.”

With that Lisa slid on the bench and reached up to grip the bar. Taking a few breaths she smiled. “Yeah. Time to find out just who that Agent Jones is dealing with.”

And with one quick push, Lisa pulled the 70 pound weight off the bar and smoothly brought the weight down and back up. Smiling, she pressed the bar up and down several times for effect as Bart looked on.

“Wow Lis. Pretty good. Is that a lot of weight?”

Lisa sat up and smiled. “70 pounds! That’s more than I weigh.” She then moaned. “Or at least more than I used to weigh. I forgot to weight myself at home. We’ll have to do that when we get back.”

Bart looked around. “So, what next?”

Lisa smiled confidently. “Now we see just how much weight I can REALLY lift!”

And with that Lisa picked up some weights and added another 20 pounds and slid back on the bench.

Bart looked on with interest, but also with a bit of concern. “Sure thing Lisa, but I have to wonder why they left all these weights here anyway. And why so much.”

As Lisa grunted after her fifth repetition, she racked the weigh with a loud clang and sat up with a disappointed and slightly angry expression. “Too light!”

This time Lisa grabbed the 25 pound weights and started to stack them on the bar.

“Lisa. Are you listening? I wonder if there isn’t something going on here.”

As Lisa finished loading the bar at 200 pounds, she turned toward him and grinned wickedly. “Well that’s something else to look into before we leave. But right now I’m feeling really strong and want to see what I can do.”

Bart sighed and looked around. “Well, OK. You can keep going. I’m going to take a look around the gym.”

Lisa grunted an acknowledgement and slid back under the bench, her thoughts focused on the weights. “Sure thing Bart.” Lisa pictured Agent Jones and grinned with cruel satisfaction. “Just a girl, huh? Know any girls who can do THIS?”

Lisa pushed the bar up and with a low pitched growl, brought the weight down to her chest. A chest now bulging with more muscle than she was sporting just minutes before. And with an even exhale, Lisa pushed the weight back up, staring up with satisfaction. “I’ll show him what this girl can do!”

In a van parked in a lot across from the school a dull light could be seen.

Inside the van a technician focused the hidden camera on Lisa. Agent Jones leaned closer.

“Wow, sir. You were right. That girl did come back. And just look at how much weight she’s lifting.”

Agent Jones leaned back. “Yes. She appears to be very stronger. This does prove that there is something strange going on here.”

The technician pulled up another camera. “How much longer do we let her go? I don’t trust her brother.”

Agent Jones stood up. “Yes. The troublemaker. We could have already had Lisa if it weren’t for him. Don’t worry, they aren’t going anywhere.”

The technician stared on as Lisa sat up and headed toward the weights. “She’s adding more plates.”

Agent Jones grimaced. “Well, this IS what we wanted to see. Perhaps we give her an opportunity to see what level she’s at. And then we deal with her and Bart.”

Bart walked around the large weights and finding a dark corner, looked up. Cameras. At least two of them. They were likely being watched. Not wanting to tip his hand, Bart looked for other exits, figuring whoever was watching would have the doors well covered. Until he could think of way out they were stuck. He looked back at Lisa as she finished adding more plates. Bart’s eyes widened. How much weight was on the bar? It had to be 400 pounds! He wanted to tell her about the cameras, but that would likely bring the men in quicker. Well, if Lisa kept getting stronger, maybe she could knock a hole in a side wall. Either way, if they were to escape, it was going to have to be up to him to figure it out.

Her regression didn't stop, and she became even younger than she already was. She could feel her arms and legs becoming even shorter, to the point that her body and head looked oversized compared to it. Her entire body kept shrinking, and she was soon completely covered by her clothes. Now really scared, she tried to scream for help, but her vocal chords were already gone. Her facial features like ears, nose, mouth and eyelashes were slowly disappearing, and her eyes lost their color, looking like small dots. Her arms and legs finally disappeared as well, and her consciousness was fading away. Soon, a small egg cell was all that remained of her, until even that faded away.

...Then she woke up. To her surprise, Maggie found herself in a strange, warm place, swimming in a weird liquid. There was little light, but she noticed a small cord attached to her navel, and could faintly see she was ina sort of bubble. It felt like a surreal dream, but Maggie soon realized that not only was it real, but it was also strangely unreal: she had not disappeared completely when she regressed, but ended up in the womb again! She didn't even know whose womb, which made things even more unreal. However, she could hear her family's faint voices. 1453.content:
One fine sunny day, Lenny and Carl were working at the Nuclear Power Plant, which was full of radioactive green carbon-rods. Lenny's job that day was to sort the carbon-rods into their usual catergories, but he didn't know that there was a new batch of carbon-rods that day that Mr Burns had pre-ordered from another power-plant. This new type of carbon-rod glowed a crimson red... As Lenny tossed the red carbon-rod aside, he felt a strange electric zap interface with his hand. Possibly just static electricity, Lenny deduced. But later, while grabbing a mocha and vanilla doughnut from the power-plant canteen, he noticed Carl staring at him oddly.

"Erm," Carl coughed before looking aside, "Lenny, when did your hair turn white and grey?" Lenny paused as his eyes bulged out in surprise and there would be a chattering noise heard as long claws would poke out from his hands, and a long busy lemur tail would soon push out of his work-clothes. His eyes turned a blinding yellow as long fangs would emerge and he crouched up in a feral pose, much like how a cat would arch its back. Carl ran away into the next room, screaming for help. Lenny's clothes fell around him as he hissed wildly, the coffee mug falling to the floor soon afterwards.

"Hey, guys! I think Lenny's turning into a lemur!"

Soon there was a small and confused lemur blinking in Lenny's work-clothes.
"Oh great, now I'll have to miss work!" Lenny chittered in a high-pitched tone.

154232.content:
Lisa sat on her bed, thinking about what kinds of superpowers she should give herself. Her thoughts kept coming back to a dream she occasionally had where she was super-strong, a pumped-up pint-size powerhouse who ran around punching out criminals and lifting national monuments with only one hand. The idea of possessing such strength in real life tickled her fancy. She was always being mocked for her intelligence, but who'd dare mess with a girl who could hurl you into space? She opened the magic book and wrote: "I wish I had superhuman strength."

The magic went into effect the instant Lisa dotted the period. A rush of energy raced throughout her entire body. Grinning from ear to ear, Lisa flexed an arm and felt the power flowing through it. To her mild surprise, the flex also brought a slight bicep to the surface. The surprise she felt became considerably less mild when the bicep, along with the other muscles in her arm, began to rapidly expand! Her other arm followed suit, inflating with massive amounts of muscle. Her pectorals — Great Buddha, I have PECS!, Lisa thought in astonishment — expanded as well.

The growth process finished in less than a minute. Wanting to get a better look at her new self, Lisa hopped off the bed and headed for the mirror hanging on her closet door. Her eyes went wide at the sight of her reflection: She was immense! Her upper body was about three times as wide as before, with colossal arms that tapered down to the same little hands she always had. Even though she hadn't grown a single inch, she would most definitely describe herself as huge. She was even bigger than she was in her dream!

Upon further observation, Lisa noted that despite the inhuman amount of muscle she now possessed, it wasn't the kind of hard, ripped muscle like her mother had had during her brief bodybuilding stint. The usual bulges of deltoids and biceps were clearly visible, but the bulges were gentle and smooth. Lisa smiled and flexed her cannonball-sized biceps. "Not bad at all," she said aloud, pleased. A loud rip suddenly brought her attention to the fact that her dress was not designed to handle such musculature. Turning partway around, she saw in the mirror that a large tear reached halfway down her broad back.

Lisa groaned. She wanted to go out and test her strength, but not at the expense of public decency laws. She needed a change in wardrobe...
154232.title: She's The Hulk In Pearls

1542322.content:
Eager to hit the streets and test her newfound might, Lisa grabbed the book off her bed, flipped it open, and began to write, "I wish I had a super--" She paused and thought for a moment. Turning her pencil around, she did a little erasing, then finished, "--an indestructible superhero costume."

Once again, the instant she finished writing, the change began. The fabric of her dress seemed to come to life, the top surging upward and over her massive shoulders as the hemline wrapped itself around her legs. She could feel the tear mend itself as back and front met, finishing the transformation from overly tight dress to comfortably snug, sleeveless leotard. A pair of skintight leggings sprouted from underneath the leotard, and stopped at about the length of a pair of shorts. A vertical blue stripe appeared in the center of the red outfit, widening to about a third of the width of Lisa's waistline. Blue gloves and boots, sporting a red trim, appeared on her hands and feet, and a stylized 'L' that appeared on her chest topped off the costume.

Turning back to the mirror, Lisa quickly eyeballed her new outfit. She had to admit, she looked pretty darn good. She also noticed for the first time that her legs had become noticeably more muscular, though not to the extremes of her upper body. Pleased with her appearance, she left her room and crept down the stairs. She had prolonged the test of her powers long enough, and she didn't want to forestall it any longer to explain her new physique to the family. Nevertheless, she was only halfway to the door when she heard a gasp from behind her.

"Lisa?!"

Bart began to feel drowsy, then collapsed.

When he got back to conciousness, he saw something wrong. Instead of a room with toys and Krusty products was a room with pink walls and Malibu Stacy dolls. Plus, he was wearing an organg dress and sandals. Bart yelped, running for the mirror at the door. As Bart suspected, from the glass was Lisa.

"Ay curamba! The book wasn't supposed to make me Lisa!" Speaking of the book, it was currently in ____'s room.

No. He doesn't want her to know about the book. They tell mom and dad.
154321121121.content:
Bart looked around Lisa's room and noticed that it was exactly the same *except* that the magic book was on her desk instead of his. Bart sighed in relief but then he heard some footsteps behind him and turned around to see what looked like him except he guessed it was Lisa in his body. Suddenly Lisa grabbed hold of him and said. "Heh! Who are you? And what are you doing in my body?" Bart felt scared but he managed to reply "Lisa. It's me. Bart. We switched bodies..I think." Lisa in Bart's body looks at Bart in her body for a second then relaxes and lets go of her. "Bart this is serious. We've got to tell mom and dad. I still don't know how something like this could happen. It's unprecedented as far as I know." Bart just stares straight ahead before saying "It's unprewhat?" Lisa sighs and says "It never happened before. As far as I know." Bart nods and smiles nervously wondering if it's be a good idea to tell Lisa about what he did and the book. After all she'd have a better chance of writing in the book correctly to turn them back and Bart was worried if he tried it again he'd mess up and something even worse would happen.

He/she didn't have long to think about it though as Lisa in his old body was clearly getting impatient. Did he tell Lisa what was really going on and ask for her help writing in the book to reverse the change?
154321121121.title: Small mercies.

choices: Go switch himself and Lisa back as soon as he is alone.
Remain in Lisa's body for a while and experience life as a girl.
1543211211212.content:
"Bart! Come on! We have to tell mom and dad about this. Heh I wonder if anything happened to them." Said Lisa in Bart's body then grabbed Bart's hand and led her old body out of the room and towards the stairs. Bart followed mostly voluntarily he figured that the best thing to do for the moment was play along and act surprised at swapping bodies with his sister.

Soon the body swapped kids arrived downstairs and headed into the kitchen where Marge and Maggie where. There was no sign of Homer though. Lisa and Bart both started to talk at once then Marge turned around and said "Heh heh heh. One at a time. What's all this fuss about anyway?" Lisa spoke up although Marge thought it was Bart for obvious reasons. "Mom..I don't quite know how to put this but..Bart and I? Marge frowns then interrupts saying. "What do you mean "Bart and I?" you *are* Bart." Lisa then continues "Well that's the thing, I'm actually Lisa. Bart's over there." Lisa points to her old body and Bart nods. At first Marge thinks this is some kind of prank. "Honestly Lisa, I mean I expected this kind of prank from Bart but I never thought you'd be involved in something so silly and mean." Bart then looks annoyed saying "No. I'm Bart. She's Lisa in my body. This isn't a prank mom. This is real." Marge still looks unconvinced although she is starting to look worried. She is about to say something when Bart finally snaps, pulls up her dress, yanks down her panties and shows Marge her butt. Marge gasps as Bart says "Heh would your precious goody two shoes Lisa do this? See? I told you this wasn't a prank." Marge begins to realise they really have switched as Lisa reacts in Bart's body by blushing and laughing nervously. "Oh my poor babies. What happened to you? AND BART STOP THAT! Stop waving your sisters butt about!" Marge said then realised how weird that sounded.

Bart pulls her panties up and smoothes out her dress as Marge begins to ask the kids how this happened. They both say they just passed out suddenly Bart taking care not to mention the magic book. Marge decides to take them to see Dr Hibbert, at first he thinks it's a joke but then they tell him some embarrassing medical thing that they didn't tell one another and he realises they really have been switched. Apart from switching bodies though they seem fine.

Soon they arrive back home and Marge begins mothering them but for Bart this is inconvenient as he wants to go to his room alone and try to correct this whole body swapping mess. Or does he? Maybe they should stay like this for a while. After all it wasn't nearly as bad as Bart had imagined being a girl or maybe being a girl was effecting his mind. But surely it couldn't hurt to stay switched just for a few days or a week could it? Bart was curious but he really kinda wanted to undo this mistake he'd made with the book.

Bart decided he would...
1543211211212.title: Bart decides to play along.

choices: Follow Bart into Lisa's old room.
Follow Lisa into Bart's old room.
15432112112122.content:
Bart was not the most inquisitive child but he was curios about what it was *really* like to be a girl and more importantly to live as one for a length of time. He decided that he would not use the book to switch back with his sister just yet. After all this was an interesting and unique opportunity to get to see life from a girls point of view so why not explore it for a while. If anything happened and he wanted to change back he could do it so long as he still had the book which he did.

Meanwhile Marge had finished making a fuss of her children and now wanted to say something important too them. Bart could tell from the look on her face. "Er..kids.." Marge began "Listen I think you should probably not tell anyone about Bart being Lisa and Lisa being Bart if you know what I mean. Dr Hibbert won't tell anyone because he's a doctor and they aren't allowed to tell people about your medical problems unless you break the law. I'm pretty sure there's no law against body swapping though so we're in the clear but other people might think your a bit.." Marge struggled to sugar coat it.

"Crazy?" Bart interrupted and Marge nodded. "Well I just think that you should try really hard to pretend that your still each other for the time being. I guess if this doesn't change then maybe we'll have to start calling you by your real names. Uh. This is all so crazy. It's just better this way right now kids. Trust me ok." Both the kids nods and make affirmation noises but then Lisa speaks up. "Heh wait a minute, Bart can't play saxophone. What if someone wants him to play my sax?" Marge thinks about it then says "Well we'll just say you lost it or it got destroyed like your first one. I think lost would be better. After all they can't make us buy another or force you to play if you don't want to." Lisa then replies "Fine. But what about grades? Bart isn't exactly..well..you know..he doesn't get good grades like I do." Bart interrupts looking smug "Yeah but Lisa aren't you forgetting what happened that time we where both in third grade? I already know all the answers from 2nd grade. They don't change it you know." He says. "Phew. That's luck. But I'm not sure if I'm up to acting like Bart. I mean I'm not a class clown or a prankster." Bart shrugs. "Eh well. I guess you don't *have* to do that stuff. They'll probably just think I've finally straitened up started being good. But try not to get lots of A's and B's Lis. They'll probably think your cheating." Marge stands up and smiles. "So it's settled then. We'll just keep this in the family and not tell anyone else for the time being."

Marge goes off to do housework and the kids flip on the TV and begin watching cartoons. After some time the show ends and they decide to go up to their rooms. Who does the story follow?
15432112112122.title: Curiosity.

choices: It goes well. No one suspects anything has happened.
It goes badly. The teachers and their friends begin to suspect something is up.
154321121121221.content:
Bart and Lisa both head upstairs towards each others rooms, after all if they are going to be pretending to be themselves then they'll need to get used to dressing, grooming and all the other habits otherwise someone may notice something suspect. Bart begins looking around the room, it's full of Malibu Stacy toys and accessories and books. Bart notices Lisa's sax and takes it and puts it away in her closet, after all if it's supposed to be lost no sense in leaving it out where someone else might see it. Bart then looks at his sisters bookshelf. "Man. My sister is such a nerd. I guess I'm gonna have to go get my own comics from my old room.." Bart says to himself and just as he is leaving he meets Lisa in the doorway. "Oh. I guess you want one of your books or your diary or something." He says still slightly weirded out that he is looking at what used to be his body although he knows it's Lisa. She nods and says "You might as well go get your radioactive man comics I guess. But don't take them to school Bart, it'd look suspicious if "I" started reading boys comics." Bart nods and begins to realise that this is going to be harder than he thought pretending to be one another, sure on paper it's easy but his natural inclinations and interests go against what he must do in order to avoid being found out.

So Bart and Lisa both exchange books and comics from their rooms. Then they realise they have to do each others homework. For Bart it is effortless because he's been in 2nd grade before and knows the answers but Lisa actually found Bart's homework more of a challenge than her usual 2nd grade stuff.

Some time later Marge calls the kids down for dinner they both come down to see Homer and Maggie already eating and Marge shepherds them to their chairs. They sit down and straight away Lisa is looking at her meal dubiously. "Mom. I know I'm in Bart's body at the moment but that doesn't mean I want to eat meat!" Lisa says to which Marge responds "I don't know how long your going to be like this but I have to believe it isn't forever and when you switch back I don't want either of you to have eaten a strange diet that might harm your bodies. Bart's used to eating meat and he needs it just as much as Bart in your body won't be eating meat as it'd probably make you ill. Oh and no overeating and making the others body fat, that goes for snacks too. If you gain weight I'll make you work it off before you switch back." Lisa just looks at Marge then at the food and says "Yes mom." realising that arguing is pointless. Oh well Marge is probably right, she thinks. It did make sense to eat the same food that their bodies normally ate even if they didn't like it. Marge's little threat about weight gain would probably stop Bart making her body fat which it would almost certainly occur to him to do sooner or later as a prank.

The rest of the evening was uneventful. They finished dinner, watched TV together and then go to bed. The next day the kids have to go to school and it's the first test of them passing themselves off as the other. Did it go well or did it go badly?
154321121121221.title: Ack, need comics.

1543211211212211.content:
The next morning Bart woke up as Lisa in her room, he opens his eyes then yawns getting out of bed and into Lisa's fluffy slippers. He walks across the room until he catches sight of himself in Lisa's mirror which causes him to become fully awake and scream. Then he stops when he remembers what happened and that he is supposed to still be in his sisters body. Then he hears some running footsteps and Lisa in Bart's body opens the door and runs into the room. "Bart! What's wrong! Did something happen? Did you change again?" She asks. Bart looks somewhat annoyed and says. "No! I just..forgot for a second when I was getting out of bed. I'm fine. I guess. Well I'm not fine, I'm you. But you get the idea. No change." Lisa merely says. "I see." Then backs out of the room and goes to get dressed.

They both get dressed in the cloths that match their bodies and then go downstairs for breakfast. Later at the breakfast table they are both eating the breakfasts that they would normally eat if they hadn't been body swapped but Homer and Marge notice that they look a little down and nervous. Homer looks at Marge who coughs and then he says. "Look kids, I know this is weird. Like something out of some crappy movie staring Pauly Shaw but just remember that no one knows except for us and Dr Hibbert and he can't tell anyone because of his hippopotamus oath." Marge and Lisa look at Homer disbelieving that he thinks doctors take an oath based on a large African water mammal. Homer continues. "So anyway the main thing is don't tell anyone and for gods sake don't watch anything by Ron Howard or that jerk who ruined the Terminator series." Lisa and Bart look at each other, Bart speaks. "I guess that's the only advice we're going to get." He says and Lisa replies. "That's creepy Bart, that's what I would have said." Before anyone can say anything else Marge points out the time and tells them to finish up so they don't miss the bus.

Pretty soon the bus comes and the kids get on with the school bags and coats. Otto had only had three blunts the night before so his driving was actually pretty good.

Otto runs down Hans Moleman while he is cross the road and throws him into the gutter. Nelson points out the window and says "HA HA!".

Well his driving was ok. Not great but ok. Soon the school bus pulls up at the school and the kids get off wondering how Otto managed to avoid a more serious accident. "Well Lisa are you ready for another day at good old Springfield Elementary?" Lisa says to Bart pretending to be Bart who responds. "Of course I am! What could be better than another day of school!" The kids head to their lockers and as Bart is closing his locker Milhouse is suddenly there on the other side of the door. "Oh hi. Milhouse, how’s it going?" Milhouse looks a bit surprised by the casual tone but replies. "Uh ok I guess. So..um..do you wanna hang out at recess?" Bart looks surprised at first but then remembers how much his friend likes Lisa. "Well, I don't know Milhouse. We'll see." Bart says then smiles at Milhouse and walks off to Ms Hoover's class. Milhouse heads to Mrs Krabapple's class where Lisa is although of course he thinks it's Bart like everyone else, ironically he gets to sit next to Lisa in class without ever realising it.

155312211.content:
During dusk one day, Lisa finished her homework. She did whatever to pass through the rest of the day, but quickly got bored of her usual routine. She went to Maggie's room hoping that playing with her baby sister would help satisfy her need to get rid of her boredom, not knowing of danger she is about to lead herself too. "Hi, Maggie!" Lisa said to her cheerfully, "You want to play?"

Lisa was frightened to see instead of the face of a smiling child she saw the a face of an evil, greedy creature. Her eyes glowed red before she jumped onto Lisa's shoulder.

"Maggie! What's wrong?" Lisa asked, too petrified to move due to the fear of being hurt or getting Maggie hurt. Maggie grew a pair of razor sharp teeth from the top of her gums that looked deadly enough to cut a person open. Lisa yelled in pain as soon as Maggie's teeth dug into the veins within her neck. She felt as if Maggie was sucking life out of her body and into her mouth. After a few moments, however, Lisa realized it wasn't her life energies that was being taken away.

Lisa felt that everything around her was getting bigger. After seeing that her clothes were trying to fall off of her and that she regained baby fat, she concluded that she was getting younger; she also guessed Maggie was getting older from the surprising increase of weight against her shoulder and her fangs' size along with the wound they caused. She would have screamed from the top of her lungs, but Maggie's bite was sucking away any strength she had to do so. Lisa ended up being...

choices: Decided to suck Marge's age as well.
1553122111.content:
Too shocked to scream, Lisa felt her clothes getting bigger and bigger every second, as Maggie was sucking the age out of her body. She gradually regressed from a 8-year old into a 5-year old, then a 2-year old, and finally a newborn baby, wailing in her oversized dress. Maggie, on the contrary, aged into a 9-year old girl, looking a lot like her (Now little) sister. Lisa seemed to have the mind of a "regular" newborn baby, as all she did was keep crying. Soon, Maggie took her in her arms, calmed her down and said :

"Ooooooohhhhhhhh... You're so cute ! Anyway, thanks a lot for your age !"

Lisa didn't react, proving that she did lost the mind of the clever 8-year old she once was. Maggie put her to sleep, and...
1553122111.title: Age reversal.

choices: start feeding on some lifeforce. (makes her younger)

15531221111.content:
As Lisa fell asleep, Maggie's clothes glowed and changed into a blue dress appropriate for her new age. The sharp teeth that appeared a moment ago stayed in her jaws. "Well that was fun," Maggie said with a blood-stained, sinister grin, "Now to take care of my dear mother." She eyed at the pacifier she once used. After a short period of hesitation, she tossed it away and left the room.
Marge did the usual housework without a care when Maggie appeared from behind. Sensing Maggie's movements, she eyed at her daughter in confusion. She looked like Lisa, except more evil and with a blue dress. Marge didn't know what was going on, but, using mothers' anticipation, she knew the girl behind her was Maggie.
"Oh mom. You should be tired from all that constant work. Maybe I should give you... a permanent break." Before Marge can respond, Maggie jumped at her almost as if she was flying. In less than a second, Maggie's teeth bored into Marge's left leg. The nerve response of the bite caused Marge to trip onto the floor.
The two of them then started to glow. Maggie's teeth proceeded to literally suck out Marge's age. Maggie quickly enlarged into a teenager, then a young adult while Marge shrunk. A few seconds later, Maggie freed her teeth from the depths of Marge's body. Maggie saw she become a grown middle-aged woman and all that remained of her mother was a newborn infant wearing a diaper with her mental abilities gone due to her new, inexperienced, baby mind.
"All right then," Maggie said, standing up when she noticed something; she didn't feel as vigorous as she used to. "Hmm. I guess I better be careful of how I use my powers. Maybe I should..."

info.brief_description: Characters from the Simpson's get Transformed on Halloween. Various types of TF supported.
info.description:
Welcome to the Simpson's Halloween TF story. This is an interactive dedicated to the transformation of characters from the Simpson's.

TF's can include but are not limited too.

Expansion.(WG, INF, ect.)
Size.(Shrink/Grow.)
Age.(AR/AP.)
Inanimate.(Object TF.)
TG.
Animal.
Clothes.

Most types of TF are allowed but there are a few rules.

No killing characters.
No sex/no vore.
New chapters must add to the story and advance the plot in some way. One or two line chapters will be edited or removed unless they are extra options that could not fit in a previous chapter due to the limited number of choices allowed in an interactive on this site.
New chapters must have at least something to do with the option that they where added too. No spam please.
Please make an effort to actually describe what's going on rather than just saying "Something happened, then something else happened. Then this happened." This is especially true for the transformations themselves, after all that's part of what makes an interactive great seeing other peoples takes on various TF's. No ending chapters without a good reason. If your going to put an end in the story be sure to tie up all or at least most of the loose ends before you do. Seriously, if it's an end let it be a natural end to the story arc not just BANG! END! For no reason.
Limited swearing please. Please keep to the age rating.
Other than that pretty much anything goes, so what are you waiting for? Get in there and transform some Simpson's!

Note: Most of the threads have a defined plot but the last thread the "Random/Freestyle halloween story thread" is for ad libbing/meandering/random story's that don't fit into the first nine threads. If you want to do something random but still Simpson's TF related please do it here not in the threads that have a defined plot that is going somewhere.
